Mike85
0
68 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
Eis que surpreendentemente um jogo da categoria F2P conseguiu colocar um sorriso no meu rosto. Não que os jogos F2P não sejam bons, mas aqui vejo um produto com qualidade de um jogo pago. Gravitas funciona muito bem como uma homenagem a portal, mesmo acreditando que alguns aspectos sobretudo da física poderiam ter recebido maior polimento, neste ponto senti que os cubos são muito mais leves do que inicialmente aparentam e de forma geral se comparado a portal a física aqui parece bem menos verossímil e isso a meu ver atrapalhou um pouco a imersão.
Agora, se por um lado o jogo é uma homenagem bastante competente, por outro eu não vi nele nenhuma grande novidade. Todo o jogo parece ser uma grande homenagem ao que foi feito e não senti nenhuma nova proposta, ele não contribui com nada proprio. É possivel sentir que tudo ali é bastante parecido com portal, mas falta talvez adicionar algo que seja propriamente do gravitas. Tomando como exemplo o proprio Portal: no primeiro jogo temos o conceito de portais sendo aplicado em uma diversidade de situações e esse conceito é explorado de formas diferentes e únicas em cada nível, em Portal 2 voce tem as mesmas mecanicas do primeiro jogo, mas tambem as pontes de luz e as tintas que modificam o cenário que adicionam novas possibilidades aos puzzles e melhoram aquilo que já existia. Acho válido por tanto parabenizar a equipe pelo trabalho e recomendar a todos os fãs de portal que experimentem o jogo, mas caso a Galaxy Shark resolva expandir o projeto levem em consideração que mesmo para uma homenagem é importante criar algo novo alem de celebrar o bom legado.

0
57 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 septembre 2020
First and foremost, despite what some people claim, this is NOT a clone of Portal. There are exactly five ways in which this game and the Portal games are similar. 1) Both this and the Portal games are puzzle games. 2) Both this and the Portal games use first-person perspective. 3) Both this and the Portal games feature cubes. 4) Both this and Portal (or Portal 2) use gravity beams (in Portal, they are the blue and orange beams that pull you or push you along the path of the beam). 5) Both this and the Portal games have a humorous narrator/observer who is testing you. Can you guess what this game doesn't have? Yes, you guessed it -- portals! It's kind of hard to be a Portal clone when there are no portals of any kind. While I strongly suspect this game was inspired by Portal, it most definitely is not a clone of Portal.

Now, having dispelled that fallacy, I can say that Gravitas is a short (1 to 1.5 hours) puzzle games in which the base mechanic is using gravity beams to manipulate the placement of cubes and to get your character through the test chambers. All of the test chambers are logical and none are too difficult (though it did take me an embarrassingly-long 20 minutes to find the solution to one of them).

I wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone who likes puzzle games. The only downside I can see is it's length -- it definitely left me wanting more -- but it's hard to complain about that considering the game is free. I'd happily pay for a longer game like this.
 
Mindcrime

Recommandé
2.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 novembre 2019
This game is incredible. Personally, I'm a huge fan of Portal 2, I would say it's in my Top 5 favorite video games of all time. After completing Portal 2, there was a void in my heart, hoping I could have more... Gravitas fills this void.

Gravitas places the player into an "art" gallery. There they are given gloves that can generate gravitational fields on certain surfaces. The player must then pass through a few courses. Each of these courses was unique and challenging through a first play-through. The humor was funny, as well as the characters such as the Curator (reminiscent of Wheatly from Portal 2). The dialogue is well written as well as the responses to actions made by the player. On my second play-through I found myself looking for all the secrets to 100% the game. The game itself is very short. And can be completed in 30min - 1hr depending on how much detail you take in from the game.

The game is very short, but sweet. It's free. Most importantly, it's fun. If you ever find yourself looking for something short that'll keep you entertained. This is most certainly it.

I would love to see more of this. I really hope a full fledged game like this comes out.

Évaluation publiée le 25 aout 2019
Jeu fort sympathique, ressemblant à portal mais avec un système de gravité

Un gameplay inédit, qui vous fera bien réfléchir !
Seul petit bémol, les développeurs n'ont pas forcément pensé à tout au niveau des énigmes, et il est possible de skip pas mal de passages grâce à quelques petites astuces, mais en soit rien de bien gênant !

Malgré la simplicité des décors, il reste très joli, les effets vraiment sympa

Le "lore" si je puis dire, est assez drôle, je vous conseil donc de le suivre ;)

Seul point négatif, c'est le manque de contenu, j'ai fini le jeu en à peine 40 minutes sans pour autant vouloir speedrun le jeu, après le jeu est gratuit, donc on ne peux pas trop en demandé non plus !

Malgré j'ai passé un bon moment et ça m'a bien fait réfléchir parfois !

Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 septembre 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

免費的一個仿傳送們遊戲，遊戲內容沒幾關，謎題偏向於簡單，不會像傳送門一樣的變態，初次玩大概40分鐘上下就可過關，有些關卡大概解法在示範影片中有教學了。

暈3D的人可能不太適合這游戲，遊戲內容中主要是成就的解法比較有趣一些，重點是有繁體中文，進遊戲後去選項更換語言即可。

====全成就====

1：大廳的方塊按鈕4顆開局和脫離各按一次

2：5隻鯊魚：第一隻在太空船上未進大廳前一直看窗戶外面的宇宙，第二隻拿到手套後返回大廳把中央展示的方塊往上吸打破上方的玻璃後上去看四周有一個窗口，第三隻在進第一關卡前左邊有一個金色太陽圖案窗戶，第四隻在第四關卡前左邊有一個窗戶有一個放置綠色和藍色方塊的櫃子跳上去看外面窗戶，第五隻在最後一關有一面玻璃阻隔然後下方會開啟一個機關看到循環方塊盯著看等廢話結束後就出現了。

3：沒拿手套就跳到前面的洞裡有一個成就，然後會開一個光環給你上來，利用那個光環的吸力慣性跳到對面的門。

4：有一個關卡可以用五~六個方塊組一個橋過去，只用一個抓準時機跳上去方塊然後吸過去過關即可。

5：第一次出現雷射關卡先撞上去死一次，後面的雷射關卡拿不到。

6：帶一個關卡前房間的垃圾桶過關，第四關比較好用。

7：第四關不打破玻璃過關，將方塊吸到玻璃牆的直角上卡住1~2道雷射後再從方塊後過去，拿到成就後在打破玻璃可配合垃圾桶成就比較好。

8：跟著劇情全破關。

Lord_Kristof
0
28 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 septembre 2022
Produit reçu gratuitement

Gravitas is a comedic and narrative heavy 3D puzzle-platformer primarily about manipulating gravity. Entirely free to play, it is very short with about 30 to 60 minutes of story and levels.

After docking at an unusual space station you meet an excitable and eccentric robot that calls themself ‘Curator’ who acts as your guide through ‘GORG’ - the Gallery of Refined Gravity. Shortly after you meet him you are presented with a ‘gravity glove’ which allows you to target designated spots on walls to create beams of light capable of slowly transporting yourself and objects across obstacles.

I found all the puzzles to be relatively easy and straightforward, I could usually see exactly what the game wanted me to do the moment I walked into the level but they are creative. The controls are pretty solid too, so even the platforming wasn’t a hindrance, the couple of times I did miss felt very much like my own fault. A chapter select is available in the main menu if you want to go back and pick up any missed achievements after completing the game.

There are obvious similarities to the Portal franchise; from the structure of the levels and puzzles, right down to Curator being remarkably like the whimsical Wheatley. Despite that, what it has achieved is polished and done extremely well. It is absolutely a fun and worthwhile experience, something I would love for it to receive an expanded sequel.
 
Ghostie

Recommandé
3.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 mars 2020
Gravitas – это короткая игра в жанре платформер-головоломка с видом от первого лица, которая смахивает на всеми нами известную игру "Portal". Сам сюжет развивается на одной космической станции, то есть в Галереи Усовершенствованной Гравитации. Там же мы проводим "Свидание" с нашим Смотрителем, который будет, сопровождать нас на экскурсии. В конце концов как избранный ученик, Смотритель даёт нам "Гравитационную Перчатку". Эта вещица по типу пушки из "Portal", но с ограничениями. И тут мы начинаем начинаем короткометражное путешествие по опасным и захватывающим уровням. Нас ждёт всего 6 уровней. И одна всего-то концовка. Также мне понравилось реплики нашего смотрителя при альтернативных действиях, в игре радует графика и оптимизация как по мне. Игра реально хорошая и заслуживает похвалы разработчикам. Да и игра бесплатная, что не может и радовать. правда Есть немало багов, но этот минус съедает её цена(а она бесплатная), реплики. графика. Прошёл я её на одном вдохе, однозначно рекомендую
10/10
 
reawint
54 produits enregistrés
0
29 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 mai 2020
Overall Score: 7.5/10
Gameplay: 8/10
Visuals: 6/10
Audio: 9/10
Story: N/A

Price/Value: 10/10 (Free)

Pros:
Really enjoyable, easy-to-grasp gameplay, which is effectively just Portal's gravity bridge mechanic. Levels are pretty well thought out for the most part, and the visuals are pretty clean. The Curator is also really enjoyable to have around, he and SHI give the game a ton of character. Really similar humor to Portal or The Stanley Parable. A decent number of achievements and some easter eggs to go for as well, if that's your thing.

♥♥♥♥:
Far too short, which is unfortunate considering how good the game is. I'd be willing to pay a few dollars if the game was at least 3 or 4 times as long, with the same level and writing quality. Graphics and certain puzzle physics could use polishing in some areas, but nothing major.

Conclusion & Thoughts:
A wonderful, free Portal clone, with lots of charm. After getting 100% completion, I still wanted more. Very few flaws, the most major one being how short it is, which should tell you something. If you're a fan of Portal or just puzzle games in general, definitely give it a shot.
 
Nyahr
1
22 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 octobre 2019
Gravitas is a very short, quirky puzzle game seemingly inspired by Portal.

The game is extremely short, which is a shame, because I can't get enough of the Curator and Shi. While Portal had funny and lovable characters, Gravitas takes it up a notch and was much funnier to me - The jokes are greatly amusing and the voice acting is absolutely spot on. The line about the one-way mirrors had me gasping for air, it was freaking hilarious.

I really, really would like a full-length game like this one, and hopefully this is only a taste of what's to come from Galaxy Shark Studios. I for one, will definitely be keeping an eye out for future projects by this developer.

Please play this game. It's fun, it's short and it's free.
It's Portal-inspired, but it's still its own game, with its own fascinating mechanics.
Loved the simple environments, enjoyed the story and loved the voice acting.
Give it a try, you wont regret it.
Only "flaw": I wish there was more, here's hoping for a sequel.

Évaluation publiée le 22 décembre 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

First off, this game is very short and shouldn't take more than an hour to beat. The game plays similar to the Portal series and some of the levels have multiple solutions, depending on how your brain works. Also, for any achievement hunters out there, this game is pretty easy to 100% and I would recommend going for it. And to top it all off? This game is free!

Recommandé
7.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 septembre 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

A short but fun Portal-esque puzzle game which is easy to 100%.

While the game is very short, it's also a lot of fun. If you're familiar with the excursion funnels and cubes in Portal 2, this game is essentially using those mechanics as it's main selling point. I quite enjoyed the dialogue, it actually once again reminded me of Portal 2 in that the main antagonist is strikingly similar to Stephen Merchant's Wheatley.

Wheatley: Indie Edition 
Une capture d'écran de Gravitas
Par : Lord Bork


Again, this is all subjective to the player but I got strong vibes of Portal with this little gem of a game.

Gravitas 
Une capture d'écran de Gravitas
Par : Lord Bork


I do have 1 small complaint though: Being unable to set custom keybinds. I see this all too frequently these days with new games and it really isn't something that should be an issue in 2019. Please fix.

TL;DR: Similar to Portal 2 in some ways and it's free so you've got no reason to not give it a shot. Highly recommended.
 
Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
Lord Bork
13,478 produits enregistrés
0
23 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
8 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
3.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 novembre 2020
Pros y contras
Aspectos positivos:
• Puzles ♥♥♥ una dificultad justa, que aprovechan de formas originales su mecánica principal que es el uso de la gravedad (siempre me gusta que los juegos aprovechen de formas distintas una mecánica que presentan, da la sensación de que la saben explotar y de un buen diseño de nivel).
• Sus personajes, que son divertidos y carismáticos. Es muy fácil encariñarse ♥♥♥ ellos.

Aspectos negativos:
• Pequeños detalles como pueden ser diálogos que tendrían mucho más sentido que se activasen únicamente en el caso de que realicemos una acción concreta, o la interfaz, que no está traducida y puede llegar a generar un poco de confusión.

Desarrollo
—Bienvenido, lector, a mi más grande y ambiciosa reseña, un proyecto en el que trabajé durante AÑOS para tu deleite (y por supuesto, experimentación. La empresa GORG ni yo nos hacemos responsables por el posible traumatismo craneoencefálico, estrés postraumático, lesiones en las pompis o cualquier otro tipo de afección negativa directa o indirecta hacia su persona, causada por las faltas ortográficas o los sin sentidos escritos por el autor). Mi nombre es... emm... ¿Joe?... EL CONSERVADOR «Sí, suena bien», y estoy aquí para guiarte en...
—A GORG Reminder: Joe es el nombre del alumno Nº 759 que murió en la cámara 4 hace 2 meses a raíz de un láser que le perforó el...
—¡¡SHI, NO ASUSTES A MI ALUMNO!!, digo, ejem, ¡¡LECTOR!!, no sabes lo que me cuesta conseguir uno.
Me encanta ver como ciertos títulos de puzles en primera persona, se inspiran en Portal (uno de mis juegos favoritos desde siempre), pero formando su propia identidad y un mundo completamente distinto. Esto es Gravitas, un videojuego de puzles en primera persona que, como podrás deducir por su nombre, su principal mecánica distintiva es el control limitado de la gravedad.
Esto lo conseguiremos gracias al uso de un guante especial, que se nos concederá al comienzo de la aventura. Tendremos que hacer uso de la gravedad de distintas formas, para poder superar las cámaras u obras de la galería espacial de El conservador. Algunas de esas formas pueden ser, usarla para poder ascender a lugares altos, desplazar cajas gigantes para formar puentes, destruir cristales o incluso obstruir láseres y así evitar la muerte.

Gravitas 
Une capture d'écran de Gravitas
Par : 1caruxx

Esta es una experiencia muy corta, que puede rondar alrededor de una o dos horas dependiendo de como se juegue, que pienso que sirve a modo de demostración de este concepto o fórmula.
El juego posee algunos elementos que me gustaron bastante y que quisiera remarcar. El primero de ellos, sus personajes. Desde ya que su plantel no es demasiado grande, y no lo necesita. Agradezco que el juego tenga solo dos personajes y tan bien trabajados. El conservador es un pequeño robot que nos va a guiar durante nuestro viaje por su galería y SHI es una inteligencia artificial que lo molesta. Ambos personajes brillan no solo por su personalidad, vista a través de sus frases y la forma en que interactúan entre ellos y ♥♥♥ vos, que resultan divertidas de ver y escuchar, sino también por el doblaje que les da vida. Se nota que los talentosos actores de voz se esforzaron para llevarlos a cabo, siendo la voz de El conservador muy graciosa y la de SHI hasta tierna.
—Activando protocolo de sonrojamiento.
SHI se sonroja.
Lo único negativo a resaltar de este apartado, es que algunos diálogos que tendría sentido que se activasen al hacer algo en particular, saltan sin la necesidad de que nosotros lo hagamos. Por ejemplo, SHI, en la primera sala, menciona algo referente a un alto nivel de vandalismo en el salón principal (que es donde estamos), pero puede que ni te hayas movido y ese diálogo se activase. Sería genial que lo dijese si, por ejemplo, tirásemos los cestos de basura.

Gravitas 
Une capture d'écran de Gravitas
Par : 1caruxx

El otro aspecto que me gustó bastante de este juego fueron sus puzles. Como bien dije antes, a pesar de ser un juego cortito, aprovecha de distintas formas la gravedad para mostrar este concepto. Me parecen puzles originales ♥♥♥ una dificultad justa, que no son muy complicados, pero entender lo próximo que se deba hacer te puede llevar un rato no muy extenso, haciéndolos bastante fluidos e interesantes. En mi caso, esta es la tercera vez que lo juego (habiendo dejado un buen tiempo de por medio para tener la experiencia fresca) y entendiendo el concepto de antemano, me pasé el juego ♥♥♥ bastante facilidad. Esto se traduce en que lo más complicado, puede llegar a ser el saber las distintas formas en que se puedan usar los elementos que tenemos a nuestra disposición, las cajas, la gravedad, etcétera. Un pequeño detalle algo negativo quizás (pero para nada preocupante), es que me hubiese gustado que el guante que usamos para controlar la gravedad, se muestre en pantalla en todo momento, como en la mayoría de juegos en primera persona, que muestran la herramienta que tengamos en mano actualmente. La primera vez que lo jugué, sentí un poco de confusión al agarrar el guante, ya que no sabía si lo tenía equipado o era necesario que me lo equipe (en ese momento ni siquiera sabía que era necesario apuntar a unas plataformas oscuras, los únicos puntos en el juego en lo que se puede controlar la gravedad. Es por esta razón que se dice que el uso de la gravedad es limitado).

Gravitas 
Une capture d'écran de Gravitas
Par : 1caruxx

La banda sonora del juego es muy relajada, aunque un tanto genérica. La primera canción que suena cuando estás en la cápsula que se ancla a la galería espacial, suena a música de ascensor (algo que encaja perfectamente en la situación, dándole un toque desenfadado y cómico a nuestra primera toma de contacto ♥♥♥ el juego) que escuché en otro lados. Así que pienso que la música usada en este juego, es una lista de canciones previamente seleccionadas (que no tiene por que estar mal, solamente quería aclarar que esa fue la sensación que me dio).
Finalmente, un último detalle mínimo pero negativo que quiero incluir en esta reseña, es que a la hora de seleccionar un idioma desde el menú principal, no noté ningún cambio en el momento. Esto se debe a que el idioma que seleccionemos, solo afectará al subtitulado del juego, pero no a su interfaz. Me llamó bastante la atención esto, ya que mirando un video, un jugador de una versión más antigua del juego, no tenía este problema. Es muy importante por esta razón, brindarle una respuesta o feedback al usuario o jugador por cada acción que realice, ya sea mostrando los cambios en el momento o ♥♥♥ una alerta o mensaje, para que vea que la acción que llevó a cabo, tuvo un efecto.

Conclusión
Este es un juego de puzles en primera persona que se lo recomiendo a todos, que, al contener ciertos guiños al estilo de la franquicia Portal, se lo recomiendo aún más a aquellos que hayan jugado estos títulos. Gravitas es una obra gratuita y corta que vale muchísimo la pena probar.
Muchos pingüinos murieron durante el transcurso de esta reseña. Se recomienda discreción.
 
1caruxx

Recommandé
3.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 octobre 2020
Прекрасная игра на 1-2 вечера. Одна идея хороша. Это вам не три в ряд, это практически единственная в своём роде игра ( из конкурентов только Portal). Хороший сюжет. Отличная проработка деталей в игре. Если вы прям упёрлись в стену и любуетесь пейзажами, то можно увидеть неровности, шероховатости стены. Также Куратор реагирует на ваше поведение, если вы долго ходите по холлу в начале игры, он начинает злиться, при пропуске его монологов, он скажет что-то типа "Ладно, но ты всё равно молодец" или "Ну да, кому я вообще нужен?". Ну и конечно же необходимо отметить ежесекундную смену выражения лица. И всё это бесплатно. Согласен, есть небольшие косяки, но идеальных игр нет. Всем советую. Удовольствие вы точно получите.
 
Ryan Gosling

Recommandé
3.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 29 juillet 2020
This is that kind of game that i want to just never end.
This game was extremely fun even if it only lasted me half an hour on first run.
But I imagine i will be coming back to play this more and more.
I feel like this is the kind of game that would be popular with speedrunners.

If Galaxy Shark studios want to make a full game I have some recommendations:
-Make the story a bit longer, maybe 3-5 hours
-Workshop maps which can add infinite playtime, they did the same with portal 2
-I need to hear more of the curator, i just love his character and reactions when you speedrun a level

10/10 take my money when the full release

Évaluation publiée le 25 novembre 2020
(Essa é uma análise da minha opinião,só pra ter uma base se vale a pena comprar ou não)-feito por vexyy

--Qual é a faixa etária desse jogo?
()Fetos
()Crianças
(x)Todos
()Jovens
()Adultos

--Apresentação e tutoriais:
()Horrível,não dá pra entender nada
()Meio broxante.
()Ok...
()A apresentação é boa e os tutoriais são entendíveis
(x)Uma bela apresentação e tutoriais bem-pensados

--Qualidade dos Gráficos:
()Veio direto da Deep Web
()Ruim
()Mais ou menos.
(x)Bom,os gráficos entregam o esperado
()Muito bom,já vai preparando o seu PC

--Cenários:
()Terrível,sangra os olhos
()Não é tão bonito.
(x)Nada de mais
()Um bom cenário,com ótimas paisagens
()Simplesmente maravilhoso,enche os olhos de tão belo.

--Jogabilidade:
()Parece que uma criança de 6 anos fez isso.
()Meio b@sta
()com um pouco de prática você pega o jeito.
()Boa jogabilidade.É divertido jogar.
(x)Muito boa.As mecânicas são gostosas de usar

--História:
(x)Sem história.
()Não faz sentido algum.Péssimo.
()Eles tentaram,mas ficou meio meh
()Boa história,com bons personagens
()Podia ser um livro

--Qualidade dos Sons e Trilha Sonora:
()Pior que funk
()Jogue no mudo,por favor.
(x)Dá pra escutar
()Músicas muito boas e criativas
()baixe as músicas,sensacional

--Otimização:
()Injogável
()Muitos lags,ruim também
()As vezes dá umas travadas,mas nada que atrapalhe a jogatina
()Muito bem otimizado
(x)Qualidade top top.Sem lags.

--Quantidade de Bugs:
()Imensa,pior que Jump Force
()Muitos Bugs
()Razoável
()Poucos bugs
(x)Super polido,quase nenhum bug

--Do que precisa para rodar?
()Até uma batata roda
()Qualquer coisa com uma tela
(x)Fica tranquilo que o seu pc roda
()Um pc mais brutinho
()Um pc da NASA,talvez?

--Dificuldade:
()Easy peasy lemon squeezy
()Fácil
(x)Normal
()Difícil
()Nível Dark Souls

--No fim,vale a pena?
()Ninguém no mundo deve jogar essa aberração
()Não gaste sou tempo e dinheiro jogando isso
()Ok,tem quem goste
(x)Vale muito a pena
()Baixa esse jogo agora,tá esperando o que?

Nota do Jogador:Pra quem gosta da série Portal,vai adorar esse jogo.Com mecânicas boas e fáceis de entender,Gravitas é um PUT* jogo free-to-play.A única coisa que não gostei é que a duração do jogo é curtíssima,mas fora isso,é uma experiência muito boa.

Pontuação final:8,5/10

<3

Évaluation publiée le 18 septembre 2019
进入【重力美术馆】收获以下体验：

▶一个寂寞又可怜的小AI要带我参观它自己设计的展馆，
▶它说：“我最近玩了款游戏超Cool，叫Portal2，就是我建造这里的灵感来源~”
▶它还说：“我很崇拜游戏里的Wheatley，超有魅力，简直是我们AI界的相声演员~。”
▶ “追星随偶像，学就学全套，现在我也不想让你走了，你要留在这一直做我的实验品 ；）”
▶听完我就懵了，台本都一样你演给谁看呢？还是说你们AI都空虚寂寞冷？

▶我跟它说：其实台下的观众就我一个，其实我也看出你有点不舍。
▶我心里想：其实我来这只想看看企鹅，其实你刚把它们全炸死勒。

Évaluation publiée le 20 avril 2023
A GORG Reminder: This game is cool.

Honestly, how many puzzle games try to do the funny robot narrator and just copy GLaDOS in the worst way possible? None of that here. The puzzles are intuitive, the achievements for solving them differently are a nice addition, the game is short, but oh boy how the dialogue of The Curator and SHI carries this experience. Great performances and writing, funny and cute in just the right measure. Worth anyone's time!

4.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 janvier 2022
If you like Portal you will like it, its clearly inspired by it. But you use gravity instead of portals.
Also the story, the characters and dialogues are cute.
The puzzles gradually get harder but nothing crazy, easy and enjoyable.
Finding all achievements requires some patience and exploration.
Very cute, I recomend it.
 
⭒𝓐111⭒࿐ ⋆

16 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
3.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 30 mars 2020
A short enjoyable puzzle game where you are a 'pupil' visiting the Gallery of Refined Gravity. All is not what it seems.
You have to move cubes via a gravity force and there are lasers in the later levels. You have a chatty curator who is either very funny or a pain in the butt. His sidekick is slightly dense.
There are shark collectables on every level. This game has achievements.
Amusing and fairly easy. Hey...it's free, so what are you waiting for?!
 
Hairy Mary
1,193 produits enregistrés
0
17 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 mars 2022
Gravitas is a short puzzle game that reminds a lot of the other game called "Portal".
You play a pupil whos spaceship docked to a so called "art gallery" and you have to pass all the different puzzles to "understand a lesson". While you are progressing, a robotic voice is going to comment on you. The voice acting was done really well and the sounds were realistically.
By equipping a special glove, you are now able to control gravity to solve the puzzles. The puzzles are quite interesting to solve and get more difficult over time. The humor is on point and I had a good laugh. The graphics look fine and the controls are quite smooth.
Overall it's a great and short game, but since it's free, give it a try if you enjoy puzzle games and you enjoyed playing "Portal".
 
Wolfgang Versace Mozart
0
19 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 janvier 2021
God I miss Portal.

It's like a Kirkland version of Portal. There's good humor and a few really good jokes, but it's generally pretty safe and I somehow managed to beat it without googling answers constantly. Achievements are a nice challenge, though. Developer is really nice though, hope to see more from them in the future. Honestly I think they are REALLY close to finding the secret sauce, might just need a few more VAs or a cleaner mic. Gameplay is solid, no bugs, art style is clean and perfect. Want to see more from this dev.

Meowish
0
22 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
Probably one of my favorite bootlegs of Portal 2!

Yes, I say this game is a bootleg, but it does aim to be original in some areas. Gravitas borrows narrative elements from its source material and makes one of the mechanics of Portal 2 a key feature...and no...it's not the portal mechanic...it's the tractor beams along with the ability to move them around (like...imagine using a portal gun with only one portal setting instead of two). Yes, that does sound bad, but it actually works well...especially since you're getting this game for free. If anything, this game would make for a great demo to Portal 2 or even a spinoff.

Gravitas gives you AI companions like The Curator (the Wheatley of this game) and S.H.I. (for the generic announcer) who bicker back and forth...one with more unique dialog than the other...while the other one is static, but makes the role her own in a quasi-sarcastic manner. The plot is as you'd expect if you've played a Portal game before, but without the murderous AI hellbent on your destruction...now instead wanting your appreciation of their art gallery (or rather The Curator's gallery).

The humor in this 1-2 hour game is rich and builds off of what you would come to expect from Portal 2 and the graphics are well done. This is a student project from SMU Guildhall (the same institution that gave us Dawn) in which the team has done an outstanding job in creating a mini-Portal game for free. In fact, I loved this game so much that I wish that there was more to it. DLC, a sequel, comic spinoff, SFM videos, collab between The Curator and Wheatley, anything!!! Gravitas may be a watered down Portal 2 bootleg but it's a d*mn good bootleg that I would love to see more of.

Phew....my word....this title has made me so invigorated! I'm only saddened by the length of this project and am hoping there's more to it, especially since the greenlight video made me laugh hard. I hope this team treats this project as a demo for larger things to come. This game (again) can be completed in 1-2 hours and achievements are fairly easy to get. If you're looking for a good short game and miss the days of Portal then look no further. Gravitas is here to whet your appetite!

10/10 Gravitas may be half a Portal, but hot d*mn was it a fun ride!!!
 
Shrodu
773 produits enregistrés
0

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante

Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 avril 2023
Un juego de puzles en 3 persona, ♥♥♥ laseres mortales y campos gravitatorios para mover cubos enormes... el juego está bien, ♥♥♥ puzzles, que te hacen pensar. No es un juego muy largo, son como 5 pantallas o puzzles, pero si no miras la solución en internet y se te tiene que ocurrir a ti, pues no se hace en media hora.

Los controles se sienten bien y el juego tiene unos gráficos normalitos, suficientes, para mi lo mejor del juego es tu anfitrión o maestro que te va presentando los puzzles, un robot psicópata muy gracioso. Las lineas están escogidas ♥♥♥ humor e inteligencia y el actor de voz lo hace genial.

Como un divertimento para jugar a ratitos, o entre otros juegos o si te van los puzzles para acabar en una tarde es muy aconsejable. Muy divertido.

Heredero directo de portal, pero original

DIFICULDADE
🔲 Uma senhora de 80 anos completaria
✅ Fácil
🔲 Normal
🔲 Difícil ( VICIANTE )
🔲 Depende da dificuldade que escolher

GRÁFICO
🔲 MS Paint
🔲 Irrelevante
🔲 Ruim
✅ Bom
🔲 Lindo gostoso
🔲 Obra de arte

TRILHA SONORA
🔲 Ruim
🔲 Nada de especial
✅ Boa
🔲 De arrepiar

NARRATIVA
🔲 Esse jogo não tem
🔲 Está lá pra quem quiser
✅ Bem escrita
🔲 Escrito por Tolkien

PREÇO
✅ De graça
🔲 Poderia ser mais barato (Compensa esperar promoção, sempre vem para este game)
🔲 Mé
🔲 Na medida, Conteúdo x Horas de jogadas
🔲 Muito caro
🔲 Dinheiro jogado fora

REQUISITOS
🔲 Roda em uma batata
✅ Mais ou menos
🔲 PC Gamer
🔲 Computador da NASA

DURAÇÃO
✅ Curto
🔲 Normal
🔲 Longo
🔲 Quando você tiver 80 anos termina

BUGS
✅ Não vi nenhum
🔲 Poucos bugs (nada que atrapalhou a gameplay, lembrando que o jogo esta em beta)
🔲 Pode ficar irritante
🔲 ARK: Survival Evolved

VALE A PENA?
🔲 Não
✅ Sim (MUITO)
 
Imitável
0
11 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
4.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 juillet 2020
Gravitas is outstanding, and I have replayed it repeatedly even after gaining all the achievements, and here is why:

1) Its simply a great game, and I cant believe that such a great game would ever be released 100% for free

2) The NPCs will react to how you do things, like they get irritated if you ignore them and do nothing, or if you do something stupid like jumping into the pit, or get to the end of the tutorial without the gravity glove, and finding them all is just so hilarious

3) The game is so cleverly designed, and some of the levels even have multiple solutions, even going so far as one level having an achievement for doing it both the right way and the wrong way each respectively

4) The graphics and Audio are surprisingly good for an indie game, especially a free one.

5) The Developer is actively patching the games bugs even though they get no profit from this and that is more than worth respecting, and if I could find a way to support them I definitely would.

6) Its the perfect little short gem of a game to pass the time for around 15-45 minutes depending on how you play

In short, if any of these things are traits you want in a game, then this is definitely worth trying, and since it's free, it won't hurt you if you turn out not to like it anyway, although personally I hope you enjoy it since it is a great game and I think the developer needs to be more widely known given the quality of this game.

  • Приятная графика
  • Хороший сюжет

  • Бесплатная

  • Игра короткая

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 29 septembre 2019
Un sucesor espiritual de Portal de corta duración pero gratiuito.

Manejamos un personaje que puede crear campos gravitatorios y debe avanzar por niveles mientras es acompañado por un simpático robot que controla la base donde hay estos niveles.

Es imposible no recordar a Wheatley por sus movimientos y su actitud tan frenética y divertida. ¡Me encanta sus expresiones y como le cambian los ojos dependiendo de su estado de ánimo!
Además por la mecánica de los cubos y su diseño de niveles de habitaciones cerradas y amplias hace que todos recordemos a la mítica saga de Valve.

¡Vamos, que si te gusta Portal deberías jugar a este juego si o si!



Lo único malo es que dura muy poco, me ha dejado ♥♥♥ ganas de ver más.

Ya tiene que ser bueno el juego si todo el mundo, yo incluido, está diciendo que el único punto malo es su baja duración (en un juego gratis además).

10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 7 novembre 2019
Gravity Manipulation!
Gravitas was a pleasant surprise. Nice visuals and sound, funny writing, interesting gameplay and puzzles and an idea and overall style reminiscent of Portal. Unfortunately, at least for me, the gravity glove was not as interesting a tool as the portal gun was. The gravity mechanic felt like it was getting old fast across the different rooms, but that might also have to do with the puzzles themselves. But, just when I was thinking that, the game reached its end with some very enjoyable last moments. Considering this is also a free game, made by a small team, I think congratulations are in order.
Highly recommend it, especially if you are a portal fan.
 
CosmosQuasar
94 produits enregistrés
0
12 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 mai 2020
Замечательная игра-головоломка на один вечер. Прошёл за два часа, ещё два выбивал 100% ачивок. С геймпадом играть в некоторых моментах очень сложно, так что приходилось помогать мышью. На удивление, в такую короткую игру засунули небольшой сюжет, юмор и даже какие-то чувства (бедные пингвины).

Что касается ачивок, добыть их не трудно - многие вы получаете ещё проходя игру, а остальные можно найти и достать, если почитать руководства. Но как же я ненавижу ачивку "Recycling": чёртовы мусорки с трудом поддаются нормальной физике, летают по всей комнате, застревают в текстурах, впадают в эпилепсию а могут просто исчезнуть и тогда проходи заново.

Игру рекомендую, я бы даже денег за это заплатил.

0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 septembre 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

Em geral é um jogo que gira em torno de "Puzzle", muito similar a Portal mais não tem relação com portais e sim a gravidade.. O jogo tem uma "Jogabilidade Comum", os "Efeitos Sonoros" é um ponto Positivo. Vale ressaltar que a "Historia" do jogo não é direta é simplesmente vaga, mais o que trás de interessante é a manipulação da gravidade e um fato muito interessante é que o jogo quebrar a 4° Parede em alguns sentidos.

O jogo é bom, trás alguns pontos legais de se jogar, ele é relativamente curto tive em média (53 min de GamePlay).. Vale a pena testa-lo, ele trara uma experiência interessante.
 
❥𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐧
147 produits enregistrés
0
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 aout 2019
Follow "First Person Exploration and Puzzle Games" for more games like this!
This is one of my highest rated first-person puzzlers, of literally hundreds. It's the first indie game I've played that successfully replicates the quirky humorous narration and atmosphere of Portal 1/2.

The only reason I rated it "4/5 Recommended" rather than "5/5 Must Play" is that it's very short (~40 mins) and the puzzles are not terribly challenging. However if that doesn't turn you off, I highly recommend it. If the developers ever turn this into a full-length game, it would be an instant recommendation.

Évaluation publiée le 12 juillet 2023
咱又找到一个入库就大赚特赚的免费游戏。
操纵重力在地图中到达目标点即可，有个情绪丰富话很多的机器馆长，感觉随着关卡推进会有剧情揭开。
同时，台词根据玩家的不同反应会有变化。我第一次进入是按部就班听它讲解，馆长比较友善。在第二次直接闯入并且跑来跑去进行物品交互，它在上方吐槽我“呆头鹅”……哈哈！

给两百个免费游戏写评测192篇

0.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 aout 2019
Vidéo YouTube™:  
Vues : 0


This will be compared to Portal, but it stands on it's own two feet. Yes, it has a few similarities (a robot and AI offering narration, puzzle solving through escape rooms, etc.) but I loved every second of this ~45 experience. Galaxy Shark Studios you should be very proud.

I want to see the gravitational pull mechanics expanded upon into a longer experience. Puzzles felt challenging without being overly complicated. Ugh, I love this game so much!
 
Tobacco
1,429 produits enregistrés
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juillet 2020
Мое мнение по данной игре:

Vidéo YouTube™: СТРАШНО И... ВЕСЕЛО! ~ Gravitas (1) 
Vues : 40
Gravitas – это короткая игра в жанре платформер-головоломка с видом от первого лица, которая переносит вас в Галерею Усовершенствованной Гравитации (также известную как ГУГ).


1. Сюжет
Прекрасен! Очень напоминает Portal. Поехавший искусственный интеллект, головоломки, космос и ученики-пингвины. Прекрасно все!
2. Графика
Хороша. Приятна глазу. Физика тоже на уровне. Лагов/багов не замечено.
3. Озвучка
Да это блин лучшее! Именно озвучка делает эту игру прекрасной.
4. Язык
Русский! Озвучка все равно английская, но для многих это даже плюс.

Общий вывод: играйте! Определенно стоит часа гемплея, который на нее уходит

Évaluation publiée le 20 aout 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Gravitas is a really neat puzzle game. It can be completed in about an hour, and the puzzles aren't too difficult. If you like the Portal games, it has a similar feel to those games. I definitely recommend this if you're looking for a free game to kill an hour of your time.
 
JashtheShoe
109 produits enregistrés
0
7 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
5.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 avril 2020
Follow our Curator Group for more reviews
Gravitas is a short and sweet puzzle game that is clearly inspired by Portal, but doesn’t feel derivative. Some of the humor is lackluster compared to Portal, but this is also a low budget indie title, not a AAA studio release. Graphically, the game looks good for a puzzle game. There aren’t many puzzles, but most of them offer a decent amount of challenge, while still explaining new mechanics well. It took me about 45 minutes to beat, my game time is wrong because I left it open while away. Given that it’s free, an hour of playtime is about right. Gravitas seems more like a large demo than a full game, but it does a good job showing off the types of puzzles they can come up with. Overall, a solid free puzzle game that would work well as a paid game if they made more levels.

7/10
Visit our website[www.mmmreviews.com] for more in-depth reviews and recommendations
 
ManlyMeatMan
4,029 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 29 décembre 2022
Portal tadında, kısa, komik, eğlenceli ve ücretsiz bir bulmaca oyunu.

Gravitas'ta uzayın derinliklerinde yer alan bir tür "Yerçekimi Müzesi"ne gidiyoruz. Burada bizi tıpkı Portal 2'deki küre robot Wheatley gibi kendini dâhi sanan, aşırı özgüvenli, geveze ve şapşal bir robot karşılıyor. Kendisi "Curator" olarak tanıtan, küp şeklindeki bu robot hem müzenin yöneticisi hem de buradaki çoğu "sanat eserinin" yaratıcısı. Ona bir de SHI adında, genellikle anons yapıp etraftaki kapıları, makineleri vs idare eden bir ana bilgisayar eşlik ediyor.

Oyunun hemen başında bize yerçekimini kısmen kontrol edebilmemizi sağlayan bir eldiven veriliyor. Kısaca AAAH adlı bu eldiven sayesinde belirli yüzeylere yerçekimi geçitleri açıp çeşitli bulmacalar çözüyoruz. Küpler, lazerler, camlar falan derken bazıları birkaç dakika düşünmenizi sağlayan, bir dizi odadan geçiyoruz.

Derken SHI müzenin her an havaya uçabileceğini ve derhal kaçış mekiklerine gitmemizi söylüyor. Ama Curator hiç oralı olmuyor ve sizi müzede dolaşmaya, bulmacalar çözmeye devam etmeye zorluyor.

Oyun boyunca Curator'ın şapşalca yorumlarını dinlemek, onunla zıtlaşıp robotun sinirlerini bozmak ve arada sırada saftirik SHI ile atışmasına şâhit olmak çok eğlenceli. Ücretsiz bir oyundan beklemeyeceğiniz kadar komik diyaloglara sahip oyun. Hatta seslendirmeler de bir o kadar başarılı ve isabetli. Ama tabii İngilizce bilmeniz şart. Yoksa esprilerin hepsi güme gider ve hiçbir şey anlamadan, sadece bulmaca çözerek oynarsanız oyundan aldığınız keyif de büyük ölçüde düşer (diye tahmin ediyorum.)

Gravitas toplamda 7 bölümden oluşuyor ve oyunu 1,5-2 saat gibi kısa bir sürede bitirmek mümkün. Bütün başarımları toplamak için uğraşırsanız bu süre 2-3 saate yaklaşıyor.

Artılar:
+ Zekice bulmacalar
+ Esprili hikaye
+ Başarılı seslendirmeler
+ Ücretsiz

Eksiler:
- Kısa oyun süresi

Portal gibi saksıyı çalıştırmanızı sağlayan, esprili birinci şahıs bulmaca oyunlarını seven herkese Gravitas'a bir uğramayı gönül rahatlığıyla tavsiye ediyorum. 7,5/10

Bu oyunu sevdiyseniz şunları da deneyebilirsiniz: Portal, Q.U.B.E.

Daha fazla incelememe göz atmak isterseniz Steam Küratör sayfamı ziyaret edebilirsiniz: Pikselatör
 
mit

Évaluation publiée le 18 décembre 2019
So, damn, good!
What a delightful delight of a treat this was!

Fantastic voice acting, graphically pleasing and easy to play. The only ♥♥♥ I can note is that I wish there were more of it to play, but it is free after all!
If you're a fan of Portal, you will not be disappointed.
If you aren't a fan of Portal, play both Portal and Gravitas and enjoy yourself!

10 / 10 - Free, interesting, cute and minimal time investment. Do yourself a favor and play this game!

传送门精神续作
关卡设计极佳，而且容易纠错，不会解密方法一错就需要读档。
毒舌的旁白，以及可以故意拗着旁白搞事。好家伙，我直接封你为史丹利的寓言2。
以及最好做一下全成就，花不了多久，但是旁白的脚本真的超超超有趣。具体方法可以看这篇指南http://store.steampowered.com
P.s.吐槽主角不会说话还有没有企鹅受伤之类的来自于影视作品/游戏的彩蛋巨多，我直接好评

Évaluation publiée le 12 septembre 2019
When you think of puzzle platformer you think of portal or talos principal.

Well gravitas is by far the best puzzle platformer i have ever played. Pick up you grave glove and use gravity plaques on walls ceilings to move yourself and boxes around. All i can say i enjoyed the game more than portal and talos principals.

10/10

Silver_SIr
3,107 produits enregistrés
0
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 avril 2022
A small free game based on gravity. There are five levels in total and it goes pretty fast. You spend more time on knocking out all the achievements.
The plot is in the style of "portal", where the computer creates a test for a person.
We are waiting for a bit of humor, a lot of lasers and fragments of broken glass, and a lot of dead penguins (which I feel sorry for the most).
The game is free, has a number of achievements for those who like to decorate their Steam profile. Achievements are quite simple (except for level 4, where I spent quite a lot of time), so the game can be safely attributed +1 to the perfect games in the perfectionist's showcase.
I recommend to get acquainted with this project to all lovers of puzzles.

0
Recommandé
0.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 mars 2020
A really great puzzle game. I would definitely recommend if you enjoy short (~35 mins) games. the mechanics are pretty cool, it features a gravity beam, which you can use to pull objects and yourself across the room. The Curator has a great personality, he's like Wheatley, but smart. The only fault of this game is sometimes the collisions are a bit weird, especially in the giant garden room. And in offline mode, it doesn't count playtime / achievements. But overall it's a great game!

Don't miss it! [9/10]

2.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 février 2021
Main points:
- Delightfully charming humor
- Interesting and engaging puzzles
- Fun and unique mechanics
- Wonderful design even on lowest settings
- Doesn't require a beefy computer
- Shouldn't take too long to complete
- 20 Achievements from story / easter eggs
- Barely any bugs and none impact game-play
- FREE

Other comments:
- Similar environment to Portal 1/2 by Valve
- The best level for the "Recycling" achievement is the last one ;)
- Even if you don't like puzzles give it a shot; it's free and very well made

Évaluation publiée le 20 novembre 2020
Es un juego corto, pero disfrutable, la verdad no he jugado portal pero he escuchado que este juego es un digno sucesor. Puede que portal sea muy bueno, no lo se. Pero eso no cambia el hecho de que este juego entretenga mucho el tiempo que dura (en mi caso que perdi tiempo observando el escenario etc 2 horas). Al ser un juego gratis tampoco tengo quejas ♥♥♥ que dure poco, aunque es verdad que una segunda parte o una continuación me agradaria siempre y cuando no baje el nivel.

En resumen, para jugar un rato, si quieres introducirte en juegos de puzzles o probar algo distinto a los tipicos juegos donde siempre se dispara es una buena opción.

h 4 z e
920 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 aout 2022
Please enjoy your visit to the GORG!
Taking clear and obvious inspiration from Portal (hardly a bad example to follow), Gravitas is a game all about "experiencing art" - under the pretence of puzzle solving.

While the physics can be a little odd at times and the movement can also be slightly weird, Gravitas does an excellent job at keeping you entertained through its witty writing, and particularly the ever-present companions. SHI in particular is brilliant: somehow they have managed to make a character who sounds almost sickly sweet and a little dense seem absolutely adorable.

If you enjoyed Portal and/or similar style games, Gravitas should be a treat. Charming, sweet and without any microtransactions or ulterior motives for profit, Gravitas is worth the time investment. The cliffhanger ending will hopefully lead to a sequel and slightly longer title - but for now, this is what we have, and it is enough to whet the appetite.

Best part? It's free.

Played on Windows 11 Pro x64 with one crash.
 
Captain Titus

「wew」
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 septembre 2019
“Gravitas”是一隻第一身視角解迷遊戲，遊戲玩法類似”Portal”，玩家用重力手套製造重力場以通過博士於博物館設計的各種機關。

有趣的遊戲題材，用心設計的每一關，這遊戲真的會讓人愛不釋手。

可惜的是，可能是免費遊戲的關係，遊戲關卡數量略顯不足。通關整個遊戲的過程用不上半小時，確實會令玩家意猶未盡。

期望開發公司在未來會推出關卡數量更多、包含更多玩法的收費版本，本人絕對會購買。

Naut
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 septembre 2020
Gravitas ist ein nur rund einstündiges, kostenloses Puzzlespiel im Stile von Portal und Co. Die grundlegende Spielmechanik ist dabei sehr ähnlich zu Portal: Mit einem Handschuh kreiert man Gravitationsportale durch die man selber oder Würfel angezogen werden und versucht so durch einen Raum zum Ausgang zu kommen.

Diese Rätselmechanik funktioniert sehr gut und macht auch durchaus Spass. Die Rätsel sind alle gut gemacht und benötigen z.T. tatsächlich etwas nachdenken. Letztlich sind alle jedoch gut machbar und wirklich schwere Rätselbrocken gibt es hier nicht. Und die Rätsel alleine könnten durchaus schon ein gefälliger Grund sein, um dem Spiel vielleicht eine Chance zu geben.

Was jedoch das Spiel fast schon zu einem "muss" für Portal-Fans macht ist die zweite grosse Parallele. Wie die AI GlaDoS in Portal gibt es auch hier in Form des Kurators eine künstliche Intelligenz, die einen durch das Spiel führt. Und wie beim grossen Vorbild, hat auch dieser seine gewissen Allmachtsfantasien und ist der eigentliche Star des Spiels. So sind auch hier die - toll auf Englisch vertonten - Monolge des Kurators (man selber bleibt stumm) resp. seine Dialoge mit dem Stationscomputer sehr witzig und kreativ gestaltet.

Fazit: Gravitas macht keinen Hehl aus seinem Vorbild und kopiert vieles sehr gefällig von Portal inkl. dem Humor. Klar kommt es nicht an die Qualität des Originals heran, trotzdem bietet es rund 1 Stunde lang tolle Unterhaltung und das erst noch kostenlos. Für Fans von Portal und Co ist das deshalb ein absolutes Pflichtspiel.
 
Gibor
1,540 produits enregistrés
1
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 juillet 2023
Puzzles hurt my brain but so does getting all the achievements (only took 2 years)
I recommend this to my friends and sharks but not my mom 'cause she would get stressed
8🦈/10⭐

"WARNING: This game is absolutely not inspired by Portal."

A short but great fun puzzle game to scratch the 3d puzzle/platform itch that you didn't realize you had until you start going through the rooms, which paired with some witty humor will have you enjoy the 45-ish minutes you need to complete it (and whatever time you need to get the achievements for that 100% completion).

Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

無料ということで早速プレイしてみました。
主人公はさまざまな場所にある青い網目状のオブジェクトに向かって重力のトンネル(？)のようなものを作ることができ、その間を主人公が移動したり、室内に転がっているキューブを動かしたりして目的地に向かうパズルゲームです。Unreal Engineを使用しているとのことで、グラフィックは思ったより綺麗。ゲーム自体も私にはちょうどいい難易度でした。1時間程度で終わってしまうので少し物足りない気がしますが、息抜き程度にやるには十分楽しかったです！

Excellent gem of an indie puzzle game, very Portal inspired. It likely won't take you more than an hour (or two if you run back through for achievements), but it's an enjoyable hour nonetheless for the excellent pricetag of FREE.

Hopeful for a full, paid game built around this prototype in the future!

karakatapakatapa
3,935 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 février 2020
When I download Gravitas I didn't expect much of it but a fun looking free to play puzzle game, But this short Game has a charm which held me in to the 'story' and characters I didn't expect. I could find myself smiling and feeling a bit bad for the Curator.

The Puzzles are interesting, but easy most times. For as long as your with the Curator, the puzzles seem to flow smoothly only really picking up in difficulty when you leave the Curator to take your own way. There's nothing wrong with puzzles being easy but when it's coming from a puzzle game, I expected a little bit more Challenge ( When you leave the Curator on your path, The difficulty for rooms slightly Spikes. Which if you push aside the difficulty, some of the puzzles made you think at the back of my head ' I'm not doing this right' as I completed some levels, which I don't know if they we're trying to get that feeling but it made me feel Guilty for not completing it the way the coders and programmers intended).

I loved the Curators personality, which I will try to avoid here for those who want a spoiler free, but for those who don't want spoiler free: The Curator in the game seemed to indicate how the multiplitude of Puplies he had, always ended up dying to his hand or the inventions. He seemed to always feel horrible with himself when this happens, as you can tell when you 'lurk' on him before a puzzle. In order to increase his mood he has taken apon him the caring of Penguins . The computer and The Curator feel very well together, and their ( at least the Curators) personality always remains as they would, and not change to something different as to progress the Story. The mood for the curator, as well as the tone of his voice, is easily understandable with the variety of facial expressions his screen can do. I loved when you stayed in certain rooms for longer than he expected and he starts insulting you or trying to help you to get a move on, It makes him feel as he actually is watching and not just a static object to track your every move. I will say the Voices for the Computer and Curator is kinda confusing at first, ( well for me) I almost instantly pointed that they sounded like the same person with a different Filter, tone, or accent added onto them. But over time I did get used to this and thought of themselves as their own person.

The achievements were fun and challenging to get. I loved the solutions and how you would have to play through the game in order to understand how to get them when you restart. The only problems I had with them was that the descriptions on steam how to get them was not too clear, making me result to a achievement guide for the game. For example, When you have to complete level four without breaking the glass, I always thought it meant without swinging the 'wrecking ball' on the first glass and just collapsing the floor. It sounds stupid on an outside perspective cause you can't progress without breaking at least one, But the achievement photo and name made it seem like that was the way. The achievements are fun but I wish they were a teeny bit more clear how to get them on the description.

I enjoyed Gravitas more than I thought I would, and it was a shame how short it was compared to a lot other games. It was fun to figure out the personality of the Curator and his options to the things around him, and how he described the puzzle with little hints squeezed in between. Knowing this game is free is another plus ( But now i feel guilty cause this game feels like it should be, at minimum, a 5$ or higher), And i will be for sure recommending others with a love for Puzzles but relaxation this game. I will surely be coming back for more

My rating:
At minimum: 6/10
Highest: 8/10

부서진포카칩
39 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
8.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 mars 2020
Gravitas to gra studia Galaxy Shark Studios z gatunku logicznych platformówek. Trzeba w niej więc trochę pomyśleć, co może być momentami nieco kłopotliwe.


⇝ Grafika. Utrzymana w klimatach futurystycznych. Raczej minimalistyczna, posiadająca kilka bazowych kolorów. Jest też bardzo estetyczna i spójna, więc przypadła mi do gustu.

⇝ Audio. Część muzyczna w niektórych momentach rozgrywki potrafi być bardzo przyjemna "tranquil music". Lecz, gdy po raz 10 próbujemy przejść dany etap, to najlepszą opcją jest jej wyciszenie. Dialogi są dobrze wykonane, momentami są lekkie przestery (kiedy na nas krzyczą :c ), co by o nich jednak nie mówić starają się być zabawne i trzeba im to oddać.

⇝ Otoczenie. Zbudowane jest z pomieszczeń oraz korytarzy dzięki, którym przechodzimy do następnego etapu, według mnie jest to świetnym rozwiązaniem, ponieważ gra stawia na realizm, a nie na wygodę. Mapki składają się z elementów takich jak lasery, wiry grawitacyjne, pola grawitacji, szklane ściany itd. Każdy poziom jest zupełnie inny.

⇝ Fizyka. Idea całej gry opiera się na manipulowaniu grawitacją. Więc fizyka odgrywa fundamentalną rolę. Pokoje skonstruowane są dość logicznie i nie występują w nich żadne anomalie fizyczne bądź animacyjne ( chyba, że coś mnie ominęło :p ). Może nie wszystkie przedmioty (w poczekalniach) są ruchome jednakże możemy wywrócić, np kosz wysypując przy okazji śmieci. Także fizyka jest na plusik.

⇝ Interfejs. Przejrzysty i minimalistyczny. Niestety nie posiada zbyt wielu opcji. Czasem występują też błędy, gdy po ponownym wczytaniu gry opcje nie zostają zapisane.

⇝ Fabuła. Rozpoczyna się przyjemną muzyczką z windy. Znajdujemy się w kosmosie, w wielkiej galerii sztuki nowoczesnej. Gdzieś z chmur jakaś pani mówi nam co mamy robić i otwiera nam drzwi do pomieszczenia, w którym wita nas mały uroczy latający robot takimi oto słowami : " you are so cute pupil". Dostajemy magiczną rękawicę i uczy nas on jak jej użyć. Nasz mechaniczny przyjaciel towarzyszy nam podczas pokonywania kolejnych poziomów. Jak się okazuję to on jest twórcą tej galerii, a my jego królikiem doświadczalnym.Większość fabuły toczy się wokół dialogów robota, który kłóci się z" ludźmi w chmurach" lub daje nam jakże świetne rady. Przerywniki fabularne bywają denerwujące, ponieważ wczytując od nowa poziom znów musimy je oglądać. Historia posiada jednak kilka zwrotów akcji i potrafi zaskoczyć.

⇝ Rozgrywka. Polega na dostaniu się do specjalnego punktu w danym pomieszczeniu. By to zrobić musimy wykonywać logiczne sekwencje z pomocą wielkich kostek oraz naszej magicznej rękawicy tworzącej wir, którym możemy przenosić obiekty lub w niego wskoczyć. Brzmi banalnie, jednak wcale nie jest, ponieważ wir kompatybilny jest tylko z ścianami grawitacyjnymi, które rozmieszczone są w dziwaczny sposób.

⇝ Cena. A w zasadzie jej brak jest dużą zaletą tej produkcji.

Podsumowując. Gravitas to ciekawa gra, w której mamy okazje wykazać się naszą inteligencją i trochę pobudzić rozleniwiony umysł, (np: całodniowym maratonem gier) do działania. Gra bywa bardzo upierdliwa, jednak pokonywanie kolejnych poziomów daje sporą satysfakcję. Przejście całej gry zajęło mi około 6 godzin więc jest niestety dosyć krótka. Mimo wszystko polecam.

Cheshire Cat
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
8.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 janvier 2020
Um ótimo jogo indie, se baseando em vários aspectos com Portal, principalmente na temática de ficção científica. Dessa vez, ao invés de controlar portais, o jogador pode manipular a gravidade. Divertido e gratuito, vale muito a pena jogar. Sugiro ao desenvolvedor, que caso tenha planos de criar uma sequencia, acrescentar mais recursos, como a possibilidade de agachar e de controlar a direção do fluxo de gravidade.

IceCreamYouScream
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 février 2021
30 minutes to beat. This is a puzzle game that requires you to utilize gravity beams to pull cubes and your character around a room in order to make a way for you to reach the exit. The game is just long enough to show you a variety of ways to solve gravity puzzles, then it ends. I enjoyed the puzzles and would enjoy playing a full length game with this mechanic.

The dialog is also superb, setting up an interesting love-hate relationship with The Curator who desperately wants someone to see his puzzles but is upset at how quickly you can solve them. He even makes some snide remarks if you run past him without listening to what he has to say. This was a nice touch.

Évaluation publiée le 13 février 2021
Gravitas is a puzzle game similar to Portal, experimenting with gravity in a test facility. It's a pretty short game (beatable in less than an hour), but for a free game it was a great experience. It's funny, and the puzzles are challenging but not too frustrating. If you like Portal, definitely try Gravitas because it's free and is very similar.

1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 octobre 2019
My best description of this game goes as follows; portal not by Valve. You could take that as a good thing or a bad thing. Do you want to play something new and creative? Well, don't look here. Are you looking for a solid game based on past successes? Then you discovered your next quick fix. Despite my subjective sub devil advocate critiquing, I do think this game is worth a play. Nothing brought me out of the experience. Writing is there to necessitate gameplay. Paired with quite a bit of funny moments, it continuously spews. Overall there isn't much I don't like about this game. I strongly suggest this game to people that are newer to computer gaming.

cum-craving cuck
1
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
11.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 mars 2021
SINTESI DEL GAMEPLAY

Potrete collocare raggi traenti su apposite pareti o appositi cubi, raggi capaci di attrarre voi come i cubi appunto. Il gameplay FPP fonda tutto sulla risoluzione di puzzle, dove dovrete sfruttare a vostro vantaggio questa logica, cercando di raggiungere la porta di uscita, spesso evitando di rimanere inceneriti da laser posizionati come ostacoli (i cubi possono farvi da scudo e i raggi traenti da ponte per superarli).

ESTRO ARTISTICO

E' un figlio di Portal in tutto e per tutto (come anche il geniale Lightmatter che vi consiglio), nel senso che, come il capostipite del genere, il gioco ci immerge, in totale solitudine umana, dentro un ambiente "asettico" e labirintico, fatto di stanze, sale e corridoi, utili solo a definire puzzle concepiti da un comica A.I., che risulta grottesca quanto spietata.

PRO

E' scuola Portal da tutti i punti di vista! Il puzzle non sono troppo difficili ma comunque sempre ben congegnati.

CONTRO

Decisamente troppo corto, è un po' uno spreco: l'impianto funziona molto bene, perché non sfruttarlo? Probabilmente gli sviluppatori non hanno creduto troppo nella loro opera.
 
Caligine

Ciubix8513
142 produits enregistrés

2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 aout 2019
This is a cute game with clever dialogue, though the story is left largely to interpretation and it's very, very short. I completed the game in a little over an hour. I would recommend Gravitas if you're bored on a short trip and have access to your PC, because the dialogue is well-written and got quite a few chuckles out of me.

Pros:
-Fun gameplay reminiscent of Portal.
-Quick start, little to no tutorial slogging.
-Witty dialogue and amusing character dynamics between SHI and the Curator.
-Well-developed. I didn't run into a single bug or glitch during my play-through.

♥♥♥♥:
-Very brief, can be completed in less than an hour if you hurry.
-Perhaps too easy for those looking for a puzzle game or who are used to Portal's challenges.

257 produits enregistrés

Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 aout 2023
A Weighty Puzzler that Lifts the Mind: Review of "Gravitas"

Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5)

"Gravitas" invites players into a world of mind-bending physics puzzles, where the laws of gravity and creativity collide to create an engaging and thought-provoking gameplay experience. Developed by Studio Team-KwaKwa, this indie game showcases the potential of gravity-manipulating mechanics to challenge and entertain players in a visually charming universe.

The core gameplay of "Gravitas" revolves around manipulating the gravitational pull of objects to navigate puzzles and progress through levels. As a character named Sprocket, players use a special gravity-altering device to manipulate cubes and spheres, bending their paths and trajectories to solve increasingly complex puzzles.

The visual design of "Gravitas" is both whimsical and inviting. The game's colorful and playful aesthetic creates a delightful backdrop for the intricate puzzles, making the act of solving them feel like a satisfying journey through a unique universe. The visual cues and animations enhance the gameplay experience, helping players visualize the impact of their gravitational adjustments.

The puzzles themselves are the heart of "Gravitas." They start simple, teaching players the basics of gravitational manipulation, and gradually become more intricate and challenging. The game effectively introduces new mechanics and obstacles, preventing the puzzles from feeling repetitive and encouraging players to continually adapt their strategies.

The narrative is presented through humorous and lighthearted dialogue between Sprocket and the AI, voiced by Erik Braa. While not deeply profound, the dialogue adds personality and charm to the experience, creating a pleasant atmosphere that complements the puzzle-solving.

However, "Gravitas" might not appeal to players seeking a deep narrative or action-packed gameplay. The game's focus on puzzles means that players who prefer faster-paced experiences might find the gameplay slow at times.

In conclusion, "Gravitas" is a delightful puzzler that leverages gravity-based mechanics to create a captivating and engaging experience. Its charming visual design, clever puzzles, and approachable learning curve make it an ideal choice for players who enjoy exercising their logic and creativity. While it might not satisfy those looking for a narrative-driven adventure, "Gravitas" offers a refreshing and intellectually stimulating journey through a world where gravity is your plaything. If you're ready to put your problem-solving skills to the test in a whimsical universe, "Gravitas" is a worthy contender that's bound to provide a gravitatingly good time.

NVRLCKY ֆʊiƈidє
550 produits enregistrés
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 aout 2021
Все говорят, что эта игра это Portal за бесплатно и я с ними согласен.
8/10
Плюсы:
1. Графика. И не смотря на это не требует сильной производительности компьютера.
2. Геймплей и головомки. Не сильно лёгкие и не сильно сложные.
3. В шутку конечно, но Смотритель смешной. А если официально, в нём мне понравились анимации, озвучка и смысл слов. И шутки тоже присутствуют.
4. Не могу не отметить русские субтитры. Можно и без них, здесь английский не сложен.
5. Знаете, это уже лично от меня, но вся атмосфера с космосом и одиночеством вызывает неоднозначные ощущения.
Слова Смотрителя тоже такое делают.
6. Акулки(:

Минусы:
К сожалению, единственный но очень значительный минус игры, она короткая. Буквально полтора часа. Потенциал огромный, очень надеюсь на продолжение.


Смело берите, уверяю вас, ваши один-два вечера вместе с несколькими минутами вне игровых рассуждений пройдут очень хорошо!!
 
꧁egdopegdoh꧂
63 produits enregistrés
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 janvier 2021
Gravitas
Год релиза: 2019
Жанр: Головоломка
Описание: Gravitas – это платформер-головоломка с видом от первого лица, которая переносит вас в Галерею Усовершенствованной Гравитации. Управляйте гравитацией и самой галереей, чтобы доказать, что вы ученик, который достоин шедевральных творений Смотрителя.

Плюсы:
-Атмосфера. Визуальная стилистика игры проработана очень хорошо, что видно сразу при первом запуске игры. Здесь стоит сказать, что игра довольно требовательна, и если у вас видеокарта времён Мезозоя, как у меня, качество лучше ставить сразу на низкое. Хотя, опять же, при первом запуске вы оцените не только стилистику игры, но и то, насколько она у вас лагает
-Озвучка. Вот что действительно удивляет, так это она. Невероятное качество для бесплатной игры, воистину
-Наличие субтитров. Слушать оригинальную харизматичную озвучку и читать субтитры одно удовольствие. Они не помешают вам в прохождении
-Наличие 20-и достижений, которые получить довольно легко. Ну, кроме мусорки...

Минусы:
-Мусорка... Она слишком багнутая...


Вывод: Gravitas это невероятно качественная головоломка, которая заманит вас с первых же минут геймплея в интересный мир Смотрителя и его комнат. Рекомендуется всем! P.s. - Пингвинов жалко...

Évaluation publiée le 4 octobre 2020
Очень увлекательная игра, советую абсолютно всем, даже людям со слабыми пк! Игрушка очень хорошая и стоит внимания, такие, как эту продают за немалые цены, а здесь мы её можем взять и поиграть бесплатно!!! В Gravitas есть много того, чего нет в других играх + можно экспериментировать и проходить игру своим способом. Разве не круто? Достижения лёгкие, игру можно пройти за час-второй (я прост на все ачивки проходил), но не смотря на это - можно полностью прочувствовать игру.
Я бы еще что-то написал, но мне лень ;)

Évaluation publiée le 18 mai 2020
This is a cute game and funny puzzle game that's free. The puzzles are along the lines of something like Portal, Quantum Conundrum, etc., with a couple of quirky voices/characters who are a machines to keep you entertained along the way. It's quite short and satisfying enough for what it is. There isn't much to say without spoiling the game. Just give it a go. Worst case scenario, you don't enjoy it and can just uninstall without much time wasted.
 
Mr. Matt

Un petit puzzle game à la 1ère personne très sympathique. Trop court, on en voudrait plus. J'imagine que c'était surtout un essai. Le jeu est en plus gratuit. Vous ne perdez rien à essayer. Je conseil Gravitas sans hésitation pour les amateurs du genre.

L'humour est là et fait plaisir et les énigmes avec la gravité sont vraiment cool. Pour les chasseurs de succès, c'est clairement donné.

A puzzle game that is the little brother to the Portal series, this is a great game to play, and I'm a little amazed that this isn't being sold in the store.

A little short (was able to get through the story in about an hour), but a very polished game, with great vocal work and a great script between the two NPCs.

Would recommend for all to play

Évaluation publiée le 26 décembre 2020
Пройдя сюжет, который совсем короткий, могу сказать, что игра неплохая. Геймплей строится на головоломках, иногда совсем простых, иногда довольно сложных. Порадовала озвучка персонажей, которых там всего два (ГГ немой, так что его здесь я не буду считать). Графика в игре конечно не уровень AAA проектов, но весьма неплохая и красивая. В принципе, игра на один вечер. Она очень короткая и ламповая, но какое то послевкусие от себя оставляет. Если есть один свободный вечер, то можно потратить его на прохождение этой игры

Buen intento en cualquier caso y para ser gratis está bien para echarse un rato.

mike24680
201 produits enregistrés
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 octobre 2020
It's not bad, but it is only around 45-60 minutes long with no real challenge, it does a good job of mimicking Portal aesthetics but has sadly none of the writing

There's no mistaking it wishes it was Portal, even the opening tutorial room looks like a very close copy of the one from the original Portal trailer! This isn't a crime by any means, it does some of the job very well, but it means the parts that miss the mark are all the more glaring.

The Curator is.. obnoxious. Games like this often force the player to listen to the monologues of "quirky" AI or scientist characters trying to set the scene but result in you standing in front of a locked door waiting play the game while they wrap up an unfunny joke that's gone on far, far too long. There were a few lines that made me smile in the middle but that's the most generous I can be.

Sadly there isn't a lot else to the game, though it feels pretty good!

Again, aesthetics (aside from the Curator himself) look wonderful, the mechanics and physics seem solid, the audio design is great, the visual feedback is well crafted.. but you only have a single ability, no alternate uses of it, and it only works on clearly marked surfaces. The only puzzle I was stuck on turned out to be that the gap that clearly looks too wide to jump across, actually is JUST possible to do so, and that really left a terrible taste in my mouth, just felt like awful design.

Cubes going through glass though is incredibly satisfying!

If you have 45 minutes, you could do far worse.
 
Nert
2,491 produits enregistrés

Évaluation publiée le 5 juillet 2020
This game has a amazing blend of humor and solving puzzles. Some times the puzzles really get in your head and you have to think outside of the box, and when your about to give up you finally get it, or some character say something funny and gives you motivation to move on. This game has the same puzzle solving as portal 2, and the same hard driven humor as. There is no game.
So I highly recommend it.

2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 mars 2020
This is good! You really need to work out some tricky moves to get through the levels. It's a shame it's so short. I presume that's to do with money, but I hope they get a deal to expand on it. The only down side for me is that sometimes there's too much talking going on while you wait to begin the level, but otherwise, well worth playing if you like problem solving games.
 
Onion
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 aout 2020
★★★★★★★★☆☆ 8/10
Kostenlos / Free

Ein kurzweiliges, unterhaltsames Puzzlespiel bei welchem, mittels Handschuh, Schwerkrafttunnel erzeugt werden welche Cuben und die eigene Person transportieren um sich so durch Räume zu manövrieren. Durch die Räume geleitet wird man von einem quasselnden Minicubus, der Kreator der Räume und Puzzles.

Die Puzzles sind eher einfach, teilweise einfacher als ich dachte. In ner knappen Stunde war ich chillig durch.

Die Hälfte der Errungenschaften spielen sich von selbst frei, für den Rest braucht es Glück und Neugier oder eben einen der Guides aus der Community, weil die doch teilweise sehr schwer sind selbst zu entdecken.

 
Alkali Ali

Простая игра-головоломка на один вечер. Сделано всё качественно, поэтому посоветую

While the game is short, that doesn't matter seeing how well put this game is, it's cute, fun, and is actually the first game I feel like reviewing, I do not regret playing this, it made me think about "how can I make his day worse". Jacobzeba01
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 aout 2019
A game with interesting mechanics and a simple but neat graphic.
Some puzzles have been difficult to solve, while most are intuitive.
I loved the characterization of the characters, especially "The Curator". His quarrels with the ship's artificial intelligence are great fun and help you relax.

I couldn't figure out how to get some achievements, but that didn't stop me from enjoying the unfortunately short but certainly enjoyable experience of the game.

If it had been more complex and longer I might have paid to play with it, but in its current state it was a good idea to distribute it for free.

Thanks for your attention and good game.

0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
6.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 avril 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Meine Beurteilung zu Gravitas

Dieses Spiel hat echt sehr viel Spaß gemacht. Es ging zwar doch ganz schön schnell, aber es ist wirklich für jeden zu empfehlen. Man muss in dem Spiel mit einem Handschuh größere Würfel und auch sich selber bewegen um weiter zu kommen. Dabei nutzt man Gravitation, die man durch den Handschuh und spezielle stellen an der Wand auslöst. Begleitet wird man dabei von Gorg und Shi. Gorg ist ein sprechender und schwebender Computerwürfel (so nenne ich ihn mal). Shi ist eine Sprachassistentin, die auf alles hört was Gorg sagt. Man selber kann aber nicht mit ihr oder Gorg reden, weil man in dem Spiel nicht reden kann. Das Spiel ist auf jeden Fall eine nette kleine Abwechslung und kostenlos. Damit kann ich nur jedem empfehlen es mal zu spielen.

Ich hoffe das euch meine Beurteilung geholfen hat einen Einblick in dieses Spiel zu bekommen.
 
Truck-Driver 2000 [GER]

Évaluation publiée le 1 juin 2021
Duration: 89 minutes in total

First time played.

I've seen this pop on this list a few times. Free on Steam. Great little puzzle first person perspective game reminiscent of portal in a way.

As previously said, it's quick, fun, and free! What's not to like. A great game to play at the end of a hard day for 60-90 minutes of escapism.

Download now and have a break from reality!

Évaluation publiée le 7 décembre 2019
Short, fun, cute. Doesn't outstay its welcome, and never tries to be anything more than the playful little 'portal-like' that it is.

Won't take you more than an hour, costs nothing, but its still better than some full priced puzzle games made by huge teams that have tried and failed with this exact format.
