Produit reçu gratuitement

Для фанатів Portal те що треба.
 
Yarloren
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
3.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 juin 2022
Overview:
'Gravitas' is a first person puzzle game where you play as an individual that enters "G.O.R.G" (or Gallery of Refined Gravity), a facility full of different puzzles revolving the manipulation of gravity. Throughout your puzzling, you're accompanied by a floating curator robot that monitors your progress and ability to solve the puzzles within the gallery. The entire game is very reminiscent of the vastly popular 'Portal' series with brain challenging puzzles that require solving all while there's an artificial intelligence with a personality that ends up getting more and more twisted as you play the game.

Although you might call 'Gravitas' a copycat of such, it is still a game done extremely and I mean extremely well and needs no explaining as to why the reviews are so positive. The game speaks for itself, it adopts an idea that has already been explored but isn't a detriment to it simply because it executes the concepts so well and feels like it's own game rather than another title that really wants to bank on the success of another. This is probably one of the very few games where I see no underlying issues and honestly could potentially say, is perfect in every department. The gameplay is intuitive with a healthy amount of challenge but not cryptic to the point of impossible and the humour isn't overdone and is a breath of fresh air from all the puzzling. It's an amazing game and honestly I would recommend it for gamers of all sorts.

Gameplay:
You play through 7 thoroughly thought out levels with various puzzles that can be a bit challenging but for the most part are pretty straightforward. I never once had to look up a walkthrough because the puzzles were easy enough to figure out but I did get lost for a few minutes for one of them. The concept of manipulating gravity to solve puzzles goes a pretty long way with the game introducing multiple different ways to manoeuvre around the map and progress to the next area keeping the feeling of the game fresh.

All while a rather humorous curator in the form of a computer AI attempts to converse with you but always comes off as awkward as it hasn't been in contact with any test subjects in a long time. The curator makes the game even more enjoyable and is a game changer when it comes to what makes a puzzle game fun. Seriously, without the curator, 'Gravitas' would just be another one of those puzzle games that exist with no rhyme or reason. But instead it presents a character with a very in-depth personality and adds a lot of life to what appears to be a simple puzzle game.

Not only that, but having a constantly changing computer AI opens up a lot of possibilities of what developers can do with the game to keep it fresh and unique. Let's be honest, having a game that throws puzzles at you in the same old dingy rooms again and again faces the risk of being repetitive at some point. But when you have an observer that gradually becomes more and more evil and corrupt, it allows the world you're in to become altered and warped by these villains in a way that not only changes up the gameplay, mood and setting, but also makes you elicit feelings towards the characters that normally isn't seen in these types of games. And for a free title, this is absolutely one that deserves the praise if not the money.

Controls:
Functional, fluent and works perfectly fine. For a game where you just have two functions, you'd imagine it'd be hard to mess the game up but you'd be surprised by how many game developers fail to program even simple puzzle piece games properly. 'Gravitas' obviously doesn't fall victim to such trivial mishaps and controls without any issues. Despite this, the game still has a control section with an image showing which keys are used and what they do. Although you can't rebind them, you really don't need to.

Graphics:
Pretty detailed and good looking all things considered. Despite the game attempting to try at a minimalistic approach, it still manages to push in a good amount of detail with surfaces actually having texture to them. The color scheme is pretty lackluster but the absence of color vibrancy actually compliments the idea that the building you're in is nothing more than a testing facility and the colors that are presented do just enough to make the game not overly plain looking. Shading and lighting are done nicely and add to the already great ambience and setting you're in.

Audio:
Absolutely amazing with more than decent sound effects, ambience, music and don't even get me started with the voice acting. The curator has such a fleshed out personality that you really feel as if there's a real person inside that tiny robot. The emotions that the curator portrays through it's voice ranges from happy to sad, mad, and just straight out evil. The curator's voice isn't as good as the infamous Glad0s or Wheatley from the 'Portal' series but still does a spectacular job at presenting an artificial intelligence becoming overly obsessed with having a test subject to observe and record. The whole premise surrounding the game and the curator progressively changing is experienced and felt through just playing the game even if you're not directly interacting with it. It's very impressive.

Conclusion/TL;DR:
'Gravitas' is a short but magnificent first person puzzle game themed around solving puzzles by manipulating gravity. It's very similar to the 'Portal' series as it consists of the player partaking in solving relatively easy and straightforward puzzles all while a supposedly friendly AI monitors and observes them. As the game advances, the AI unsurprisingly becomes overly attached to the player and transitions from awkwardly friendly to dangerously obsessive with the primary goal of keeping the player in the facility to continue testing for all eternity.

It's not quite like the popular predecessor but man does it do a damn good job at what it set out to do. 'Gravitas' is one of those hidden gems you do not want to miss especially if you're into this type of genre. If you enjoy first person puzzle games, comedic-turned-dark games or hell, just games in general, then 'Gravitas' is a serious must try. You'd be doing your game playing urge a disservice by not giving this sadly obscure masterpiece a chance.
 
The Old Taylor Swiftsz
4,428 produits enregistrés
0

Évaluation publiée le 21 mai 2022
╭──╯Gráficos╰──╮
🔲 Atari.
🔲 Fogo Grátis.
🔲 Bonzinho até.
✔️ Ótimo.
🔲 Red Dead Redemption II.
🔲 Cada frame foi pintado por Da Vinci.

╭──╯Requisitos╰──╮
🔲 Uma calculadora com uma Duracell.
🔲 Um J5 Prime.
✔️ Um computador da Positivo.
🔲 No minímo um Pc razoável.
🔲 Pc Gamer top.
🔲 4 RTX2080TI ligadas numa usina nuclear.

╭──╯História╰──╮
🔲 História? Que História?.
🔲 Tem uma historinha.
✔️ Uma história digna de prestar atenção.
🔲 É sobre a vida real.
🔲 Platão escreveu junto com Machado de Assis e virou novela das 9hrs.

╭──╯Jogabilidade╰──╮
🔲 Precisa de dois dedos pra jogar.
✔️ Aceitável (4 dedos para ser específico).
🔲 Jogabilidade bacana.
🔲 Necessita de aparatos gamers.

╭──╯Complexidade╰──╮
🔲 Jogo da Velha é mais complexo.
🔲 Fácil de entender.
🔲 Fácil de aprender, difícil de dominar.
✔️ É daqueles jogos que as pessoas ficam estudando.
🔲 Precisa de 2 doutorados em Física Quântica.
(Obs: Você precisará da ajuda do Cellbit para zerar 100%)

╭──╯Dificuldade╰──╮
🔲 Você Escolhe a dificuldade.
🔲 Seu cachorro consegue.
🔲 Da pra zerar com o touch do celular.
✔️ Mediana.
🔲 Dark Souls III.
🔲 Você precisa de 4 mãos e super reflexos.

╭──╯Tempo de Jogo╰──╮
🔲 Da jogar enquanto ouve 1 música.
✔️ Podia ter ido ver o filme do Pelé (0 - 3 Hrs)
🔲 Faça um lanchinho (4 - 8 Hrs)
🔲 Você vai precisar dormir (10 - 20 Hrs)
🔲 Termina em uma semana (40 - 60 Hrs)
🔲 Rapaiz, talvez em um mês... (70 - 100 Hrs)
🔲 Você começa, seu filho termina (100+ Hrs)

╭──╯Áudio/Músicas╰──╮
🔲 Esqueceram do áudio.
🔲 Seus ouvidos não merecem isso.
✔️ O suficiente pra escutar sem problemas.
🔲 Muito bom.
🔲 Mozart escreveu junto com Beethoven.

╭──╯Bugs╰──╮
✔️ Nunca vi nenhum.
🔲 Pequenos bugs.
🔲 Deixam o Jogo Engraçado.
🔲 Estragam o Jogo.
🔲 Cyberpunk 2077.

╭──╯Público╰──╮
🔲 Crianças.
✔️ Adolescentes.
✔️ Adultos.
🔲 Moradores do porão da mãe (Rejeitados pela Humanidade).
🔲 Vem Jogar com Seu Cachorro Junto.

╭──╯Compensa Comprar?╰──╮
✔️ IT'S FREE.
🔲 Preço justo.

Évaluation publiée le 6 mars 2022
Gravitas es un juego entretenido, el cual tiene una fuerte inspiración en Portal y Stanley Parable, pero es fiel a su estilo y mecánicas. Un punto muy bueno que tiene es que su humor puede ser divertido para la mayor parte de los jugadores, algunos de sus secretos son muy divertidos, y sus acertijos no son tan complicados. Recomiendo mucho este juego y espero que saquen más juegos de este estilo.

Very simple and short. As iterated many times by others the puzzles are not that hard but are still creative.

I do believe that more could have been done with the mechanics, though, with maybe some added features/utility. Only weakness of the game is that it isn't that long and the story consequently isn't the most memorable.

Still, it is very good.

Also, wished I could have gravitied the Curator. There was one opportunity near the end where he aligned with a panel thing but alas, the game apparently did not allow it.

4.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 avril 2021
First off, i gotta say this is a real good game.

My Rating: 87/100

Story: 9,5/10 The story is good, but short.

Gameplay: 10/10

Difficulty: At some levels you have to think a little bit, but it's not difficult.

Graphics: 8,5/10
(My graphic points are based on the graphic and what year the game was released. So for example if the game is from 2010 and the graphics are good for 2010, it's a 10/10.)

Sounddesign / Music: 8,5/10

Duration: One Story Run: 0,5h - 1h, 100% Steam Achievments: 1,5h - 2h

Replayability: Yes if you whait a bit

Price: Game: Free (Absolutely Worth it)

Additional comments:
You get a glove that allows you to create a beam that attracts things and you have to solve puzzles with it.
The puzzles are well made.

Puzzles are not too hard honestly... Died only once... well, twice technically, but the first time was a simple physics glitch. Took me around 45 Minutes to complete, though, I'd say a fair chunk of that was just listening to the "Curator" ramble on and on.. So cute.

I'd recommend! It's free after all and it got me smiling!

Eddy99x
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 novembre 2020
O é muito engraçado,as fases são muito bem feitas músicas legais e efeitos sonoros muitos aceitaveis pra um jogo de graça de puzzle.O design do jogo e os níveis são muito fodas apesar de ser um jogo curto é muito bem feito.Em geral é um jogo que gira em torno de "Puzzle", muito similar a Portal mais não tem relação com portais e sim a gravidade.. O jogo tem uma "Jogabilidade Comum", os "Efeitos Sonoros" é um ponto Positivo. Vale ressaltar que a "Historia" do jogo não é direta é simplesmente vaga, mais o que trás de interessante é a manipulação da gravidade e um fato muito interessante é que o jogo quebrar a 4° Parede em alguns sentidos.

O jogo é bom, trás alguns pontos legais de se jogar, ele é relativamente curto tive em média (53 min de GamePlay).. Vale a pena testa-lo, ele trara uma experiência interessante e o robozinho é muito engraçado kk

Dare_The_Runner
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 aout 2020
Phenomenal game! I cannot believe that its free.

It seems like a great blend between Q.U.B.E. (in its graphic design) and Portal (in the gameplay and commentary sense).

The visuals are outstanding. What you see in the screenshots are exactly what you get in game, even that gorgeous lighting!

The puzzles are simple but very fun. Your main tool is similar to the excursion funnels from Portal 2, but you can place them on certain surfaces to pull yourself and various types of cubes in.

The acting was hilarious, i found myself dying of laughter within the first few minutes of playing. There are also a number of portal references in both the game and voice lines for the more keen players.

The only ♥♥♥♥ I can see is that the game is a little too reminiscent of Portal, and it is extremely short. Given that its free, however, I would recommend this game to anyone who is a fan of puzzle platformers!
 
Catalyst
376 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 aout 2020
The game design isn't what I was expecting when I read that it uses gravity for the sake of puzzle mechanics. You don't alter gravity everywhere, you just make pretty little tubes of get-over-there. The puzzles on their own aren't especially excellent, but the presentation of the narrator is excellent and the narrative felt very fresh to me. I genuinely feel like the mindset suggested by the narrator: to view the puzzles as works of art adds a delightful bit of depth to the game. There are about 8 puzzles in all, if I remember correctly so the game isn't very long. But, overall, I think this game is worth a play if you're in to the genre. If you don't want to buy Portal or want something similar and more concise, this game absolutely delivers.

142 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 juillet 2020
Un superbe jeu portal-esque gratuit. Alors que demande le peuple ?

- Le voice acting est incroyable,
- La maniabilité est impeccable,
- Les succès un peu planqués vous referont jouer au jeu dont la durée de vie est assez courte.

Mais ce jeu est une très bonne expérience !
A présent je surveille les prochains jeux que vont proposer les Galaxy Shark Studios ;)
 
Tox Mulder
293 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 juin 2020
Un jeu très sympa et très agréable. Sur certains points, il peut rappeler portal de part un gameplay très simple et intuitif et malgré ça des énigmes très bien pensées (avis personnel et sans exigence rude), ou bien encore par son humour qui je trouve est très agréable.
Mais le principal problème à ce jeu c'est que sa durée est beaucoup trop court. Je l'ai fini en même pas 1 heure alors que je galérais sur une énigme pendant plusieurs longues minutes. De plus il n'y a pas de workshop disponible pour régler ce problème.
Mais malgré ce gros défaut, je vous le recommande fortement car c'est un petit jeu très rapide à installer, qu'on peut lancer sur quasiment n'importe quel ordinateur et qui peut par exemple vous occuper durant un trajet en train ou même quand vous ne savait pas trop quoi faire mais que vous n'avez pas beaucoup de temps

33 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 avril 2020
I liked it. Why? Let's go through my points.

Plot
It's poor, but the game is short enough that it doesn't matter, because you're focused on puzzles

Sounds and music
They're unfortunatelly probably taken from some kind of free sounds repository, but they fit perfectly.

Gameplay
It's great. Gives me portal vibes. The idea is taken from Portal 2, but in Portal it wasn't used this way, so big plus.

Graphics
They're simple, but good. They fit the climate of this game.

Summing up, if you've enjoyed Portal, you will find this game fun.

 
marvelmax
69 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 avril 2020
很棒的解谜游戏，关卡不多，流程很短，难度也不高，创意非常棒，推荐！
可爱的方块博士超话痨，如果你做出令他以外的事情或者对他的话无动于衷都是有彩蛋的，超好笑，而shi助手机械的各种提示，蠢蠢的机械思维，恰到好处的对方块博士的嘲讽真的好好笑。游戏里还有很多有趣的彩蛋，比如出现的每一个垃圾桶都是可以踢飞的（当然你踢了以后100%会穿模，我保证）。过关后查看成就发现居然还有好多未完成，使我非常有兴趣去刷二周目。
不过也有许多的问题，比如过高的视角抖动，令人晕眩的动态模糊，摄像机奇怪的视角位置，还有不够好的光影等等使人在游戏中的体验大打折扣，即使是不晕3d的人也可能会在这款游戏里感到晕眩。在重力场中的场景模糊和移速过快又使人不能愉快解谜，物理引擎的设定感觉也有些别扭（比如方块移动快了就会脱离控制，还比如可以通过反复移动重力场来把方块甩出去...），可以创建重力场的地方设计的使人有些眼花缭乱，有的时候方块会紧贴在墙壁上导致没办法在方块的后面调整重力场的位置。此外还有杂七杂八的穿模bug等小问题。
不过说实话，对于很少的制作人员和免费的价格，做到这个程度是非常的不错了。其实看到这个游戏的时候我觉得和传送门2还是比较类似的，我觉得可以学习传送门2的一些方便游戏的设定，比如方块化，在某块板子的任何一个角落设置重力场都会生成在板子中间的重力场，这样子可以避免还要对重力场进行微调才能吸引到方块的麻烦操作。
看更新时间的话制作组大概已经不会再继续制作这款游戏了，不过其实创意真的不错，如果有续作的话我一定会支持的。
其实如果沿用传送门2的设定，制作成传送门2的同人游戏，加入排斥力场和更多的关卡，我也是十分乐意购买的。创意真的十分棒！
 
TraceWind

BenjaminBE4
231 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 décembre 2019
I genuinely loved this game, seriously. It may be only around 1-2 hours depending on how good you are at puzzle games, but they're probably the best two hours I've spent on a game like this. It's short, but full of charm with each characters' dialogue.

The only really annoying thing with it is that it seems even after beating each level several times, at least one of the level completion achievements keeps locking itself, meaning I sadly can't 100% the game. I do hope the developers could fix this or simply help me figure out what's going on as it's the first game this has happened in.

Other that that, I'd highly recommend that you play this game, even if you only have a semi-modern computer (you can lower some graphics settings). Plus, it's free!

I'm excited for whatever the team goes on to make next! :D

Jesus Christ, this game was a treat. The humor was amazing and I think I laughed more times in and hour and a half then I have in the past 2 months. I havent found video games as fun as I did when I was younger, but this (besides CS:GO) is what keeps me wanting to try new games and keep playing games in general.

My only compliant is that the game is short, however I dont think the story should be altered, just some free DLC released or some mod tools made for this game by the devs.

Asjatu
114 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 novembre 2019
Produit reçu gratuitement

La primera impresión al jugarlo es que está inspirado en Wheatley (Portal) y Chispa Culpable 343 (Halo). La impresión final es la misma jaja.

Es divertido y original, la mecánica es simple pero no sé si se trata tanto de eso, como de reírte ♥♥♥ de las interacciones ♥♥♥ el "curador" de la galería. Un gran punto a favor: algunos de los logros te muestran de qué maneras fastidiar o conseguir una respuesta distinta del "curador". Y la ingenuidad de SHI te hace sonreír.

Chistes simples, puzzles que te pueden complicar un rato, pero dentro de todo simples, y unas cuantas sonrisas aseguradas. Recomendaría comprarlo pero ¡ey! ¡es gratis! ¿Por qué no apoyar a Taylor Pate?

This has be one of the best indie games I have played recently. The game is filled with charm and really cool moments. Regardless, this game is really worth playing and every Portal player will feel right at home.

Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 juin 2020
This game is exactly like Portal 2! But instead of a portal gun you have the ability of gravity at your disposal to get through some tricky and fun puzzles! It's really cool especially for A FREE GAME. Which honestly should be a game you should pay for if it was a little longer. The curator is very similar to Wheatley as well: Talkative, high-strung, and the most important thing trying to betray you or kill you.
 
Horizon
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 mars 2023
Pretty short and sweet puzzle platformer. There is really no reason not to play this game.

Pros:
- Original game mechanics
- Levels are strictly increasing in difficulty from very easy to medium-hard
- Sometimes funny, jokes about software development (can be a ♥♥♥ depending on you)

♥♥♥♥:
- The ending is inconclusive. We've been introduced to cool characters, but nothing really happens. So don't play for the plot and don't expect any Shyamalan-like twists.

BFHM
14 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 avril 2021
Do you like portal?. Do you like the gravity mechanic from it? AND most importantly: Would you enjoy having an artistic recreation from weatley? (comedy, bit of storytelling). From my perspective this game deserves to be one of the few games which can be completed in under an hour while remaining completely entertaining, it even manages to be replayable thanks to its "branching" dialogue (dont expect tell-tale games grade of branching; nevertheless it's good), interesting characters and replayable segments of a puzzle thanks to its polished mechanics.

TL;DR: (PoRtAL 3 ThE MiNiGaME)^3

RevonX
79 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 mars 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

{Graficos) : 3D al mejor estilo portal y hasta un poco mas modernos
9/10

{Jugabilidad) : Puzzles copados y buen manejo de la fisica. Dificultad media
10/10

{La Platinacion) : Para algunos logros tuve que buscar una guia ( mas para buscar los tiburones ). Lo jugaras mas de una vez. No lo platine pero hay un logro que aun no se como lo hare, me resulta algo injusto (llevar el tacho mas bugueado que te puedas imaginar de un lado al otro).

{Duracion) : No muy largo. Capaz que en una o dos tardes te lo platinas ( a esepcion de ese maldito logro)

{Requisitos) : Pc medio

{Historia) : No es una copia de portal, es mas bien basado ya que presenta una historia totalmente diferente y el conservador del museo es un capo

{Reseña Final) : Si jugaste Portal y te quedaste ♥♥♥ ganas de mas, te lo recomiendo y si no jugaste portal y no los quieres comprar por tacaño, te lo recomiendo.


9/10

Évaluation publiée le 19 février 2020
Muy del estilo de Portal 2, incluidos los comentarios del personaje que te acompaña. Es igual que el del portal pero en el buen sentido. El doblaje es una maravilla y la historia es sencilla pero cautivadora. Me ha gustado mucho. Menos de una hora de juego pero bien realizado. Y sobre todo, es gratis.

Recomendadísimo para alguien a quien le gusten los juegos de puzzles

TDark
75 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 septembre 2019
Очень классная игра, которая напоминает о Portal, а именно: эксперименты, черный юмор и похожий сюжет. За это я не осуждаю разработчиков, поскольку это наоборот - создаёт ностальгию прошлого.
В целом,крутая игрушка, в которую можно поиграть поздним вечером и пройти за где-то за час.

P. S. - может быть эту игру можно пройти быстрее. Извините, но я просто слишком увлекся словами Смотрителя :)
 
Дакрах
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 septembre 2019
First impressions were not good. No proper ultrawide resolution support and the FOV was too narrow for the aspect ratio.

I made a post on the forums and a developer reached out to ask further questions. Within days a patch was out and I could enjoy the game.

10/10 best devs, thank you for caring about your players!

5 easy puzzles and a difficult final one, where I was probably just overthinking. Beatable in less than 30 minutes. If you like hunting achievements, there's some extra time in it for you. The dialogues aren't funny and only annoyed me, I'd have preferred more puzzles over bad jokes. I'd give the game a "meh" rating, but it's free, so if you like Portal-like games, just give it a shot.

Évaluation publiée le 22 février 2020
Though obviously greatly inspired by Portal and the Excursion Funnel, Gravitas isn't a simple copycat or rip-off. Despite having a similar flavour, it stands in its own right and requires its own sort of spatial thinking. I don't know why something this good is free, but definitely take advantage of it.

Produit reçu gratuitement

Basically Portal with Gravity.

While the game is both free and short, there is potential for a sequel that could introduce cooperative play, custom maps, advanced or challenging levels, and new mechanics involving gravity.
I would gladly pay for such a sequel.
Highly recommended if you enjoy titles like Portal and puzzle games (no replay value though unless you do the achievements).

328MS
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 juin 2021
I recently attempted a replay of Portal only to be kind of bored. The fascinating thing about its legacy to me is that, despite having a massive impact on the gaming industry for over a decade (e.g. this game), it's ultimately kind of a novelty in terms of holding its own. Once you start "thinking with portals," the gameplay is quite easy and the plot itself is too simple to justify its own replay value. The jokes that saturated pop culture references for years feel tired now, as they've been overused and outdated by so many games trying to outdo them, several of which succeeded. Despite this, the very fabric of puzzle-based POV games was altered, and I'm always happy to find new games that so clearly takes their cues from Portal while still being original in scope and plot.

Gravitas is one of those, and it's a fairly lengthy game considering its selling price of "FREE." The graphics are great, the plot is fun, and the puzzles can be legitimately challenging without feeling cheap or too vague to figure out. I'd gladly have paid $10 for this, so I can't recommend it enough.
 
ルーク・ウィルソン

klenha
134 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
10.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
I LOVE THIS GAME!!
One of, if not the BEST game I have played for free.
This game will undoubtedly be compared to Portal, however it is not sitting in a shadow. By itself, the mechanics are fun and interesting, challenging but enough to make a player feel accomplished when they figure it out. The Curator has an amazing personality and design, I LOVE his little eyes (and how he spins around when excited ^-^!) The dialogue with SHI is hilarious and I played through the game a few more times to find all of the little extra lines he says when you disobey him,
Every single second of this game is packed with personality, or as the Curator would say "meaning".
So many fun callbacks (BARTHOLOCUBE!!) and achievements (Sharks!) The voice acting is amazing too, I can HEAR the sadness for those penguins (RIP) and the conviction as he looks at the art. The dialogue is so funny as the robot acts as an actual person and the instructions at the first pit is the most creative way I've ever seen a game tell me to left click.
Overall, I would LOVE SO MUCH if this game gets expanded and would pay full price for a longer version/sequel. Good job devs!!

MAX
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 décembre 2019
This game is the spiritual successor of Portal.

It's an amazing game. The mechanics are refreshing and intuitive.
What I really liked is that there's no way you can screw up the level so much that you're doomed.
This allowed me to just give it the old college try without having to be scared about the consequences.

I really loved the way the Curator interacted with everything, the developers really took their time to look for stuff players might do.

As other people have said as well, It's a shame it's such a short game.
This is not a boo for the developers but a compliment that they've made such a great game that has me left wanting for more.

Recommandé
1.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 juillet 2021
Not a bad logic game. I like the idea itself and there are no big problems with its implementation. The graphics in the game are not the best, but the graphics are not the essence of such games. There are no special sounds in the game that have been put in, they are fine. It can be played in a short time (1 hour), the tasks in it are not complicated. Overall, it is a relatively good game. For those who love such games, it is definitely worth a try.
 
Nem AB_Aron
53 produits enregistrés
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 décembre 2020
This game used one of Portal 2's mechanics and expanded on it into a full game. The problem is, it already felt like Portal had squeezed all potential out of the idea already. This is why Gravitas is only 1 hour long. That being said, I really enjoyed the game. The humour is nearly identical to Portal's and the short game length means that there isn't any unnecessary padding (looking at you Portal 2).

The puzzles are cleverly made with enough, but not too many mechanics. Some of the puzzles were a little bit frustrating. I was unclear on what they wanted from me which led to a lot of guessing and improvisation. I couldn't figure out how to do some puzzles which led to me cheesing most of the later ones. I do like how I was able to do that as it encourages creativity.

Overall, the game is quite a bit worse than Portal 1 and 2 however it's still a great experience. It's is literally free so I don't see any reason to not get this game. It's not like that 1GB of storage will be missed.

8 / 10
 
Peter Jones
66 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Évaluation publiée le 5 novembre 2021

Волшебная и угарная головоломка, похожая на - о боже! - Портал. Как по мне, Gravitas - идеальный пример короткого физического пазла, головоломки которого спокойно можно решить за пару часов. Очень хотелось бы получить продолжение или новую похожую игру от Galaxy shark studio.

Прекрасная игра на пару-тройку часов прохождения. Сложность не высокая, но местами заставляет подумать. Идея игры явно взята с Portal. Уровни галереи сделаны симпатично, а сопровождающий нас робот делает всю атмосферу)
Единственный минус игры - она слишком короткая. Добавь разработчик еще уровней на несколько часов и ее смело можно было бы делать платной, она того стоит
 
Chitus
0
19 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
I am 40 minutes into this game and I love it, I will definitely keep on playing but I do have a few things I would change.
The voice lines have distortion on them which can get very annoying and it sounds like the voice actor switches microphones a few times and it is very unimersive.
The sound of going through the gravity things sounds like my pc is ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ itself, I very much dislike it.
Apart from that no complaints, a very good puzzle game and would Totaly recommend.

Every positive review here is well earned. This game is the easiest thing to understand, and yet it's still hard enough to keep you busy. The comedy is fantastic, levels well designed, and the assets charming. My one complaint is it's a little laggy for the polygon count, but that's no trouble compared to the rest of this adorable game.

Axolotl_NM
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 10 septembre 2019
挺有意思的。这款解谜游戏的机制是，你可以通过在特定的界面上创造重力通道来帮助你和场景中的物品移动。关卡不多，一个小时可通关，但都很有意思。角色的配音也做得很不错，场景的氛围也恰到好处。
总而言之，作为一款免费游戏，本作的素质应该算很高了。如果能更深刻地挖掘解谜机制，设计出更多有趣的谜题，做出一个游戏时长更长的“完整版”的话，都可以拿来卖钱了。当然我也不是说现在的版本不完整，即使时长很短，这也是一款很完整的作品了。给个好评以资鼓励。
 
OldCaptainWZJ
418 produits enregistrés
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 octobre 2019
Плюсы:
Юмор
Отсылки
Головоломки
Минусы:
Все плюсы присутствуют в очень малом количестве
Cложных задачек нет
Субтитры порой пропадают очень быстро
Игра очень, ну прям очень короткая
Итог:
Ничего выдающегося и выделяющегося. Всего понемногу, а надо было хотя бы на что-то одно сделать упор побольше. Хорошо хоть бесплатная, а не как у некоторых разработчиков/студий (явно не стоящий продукт за оверпрайс).

Phantome Yurai
23 produits enregistrés
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 aout 2019
Uhm... my main go to word for a lot of real actual indie games like this one is "potential" But, I can't say this game has potential.(Pause for dramatic effect) I say it doesn't have potential because potential means that it can evolve into something much greater than it already is, in that use of the word, this game doesn't have potential because it delivered and showed, a great, major form of what it is. The game is heavily polished from my near hour play through because I can honestly say I did not experience a single bug. The dialogue is so great that when I accidentally skipped some, I would feel a great feeling of "Whoops, didn't want to do that(Jim From the Office Look)". If you've ever played a Yakuza or GTA game, you know about those fun activities that distract you from the main game, This game's spin on that are at the beginning of each level/loading zone are a museum exhibit that consists of 4 uniquely modeled cubes and a cool moving piece of art behind a window. I loved this part of the game so much because it felt like a great reward after completing each level. Of course this game takes inspiration from Portal and it really did the genre justice. Another small thing is the reveal of each "environment" that just felt really grand and special. The puzzles were intuitive and a blast to figure out. The game is brimming with personality. The story is a really nice tale to play out. I finished the game in 0.8 hours in two sittings(I had a thing that came up, so I could have finished it in one). Overall fantastic game that really made my day.
 
Jinko
583 produits enregistrés
0
8 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 mai 2020
So, first off, I don't think this is a bad game. It's a fun game and the puzzles are interesting, but the physics engine leaves a lot to be desired. Some things just dont' seem to land properly or move in a way that makes the puzzle more accessible (I said "accessible", not "easy").

Honestly, if you can get past that, I'd recommend it. I can't justify finishing it, however, if I can't even get past the physics issue.

alxfrud.
38 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 novembre 2020
this game is amazing,
it is witty and well constructed puzzles.

the core mechanic that is the glove is just so fun and intuitive to use!
i have one-hundred percented this game and I had an
absolute blast playing it.

it gave another puzzle game than portal 1 and 2 to revisit even after
i had done everything I could.

this is not only worth your time, but also worth your money...
OH WAIT, IT'S FREE!!!

the fact they made this impeccable game free still astounds me!

Gravitas is a breath of fresh air, it is funny, smart, and i love it.

and i kinda want a sequel not gonna lie :)

My only problem with it, is there are quite a few bugs; most notably in the lobby with small moveable objects (also with the trashcans), but doesnt subtract from the gameplay expirience very much

Produit reçu gratuitement

Muito bom! esse jogo é de enigma então tem que usar muito a cabeça, vc começa dentro de um espaço nave vai para a "casa" de um robô onde ele te ensina a jogar e constroi o enigma com gravidade pra vc, a jogabilidade é maravilhosa mas o game não tem muitas opçoês de graficos então, não pense que seu pc da xuxa rode nesse jogo rsrsrs, o meu pc rodou o game sem placa de video com o um i5 2004 3.10ghz em 20 á 27fps, recomendo por que é um jogo curto, relaxante e engraçado. Baixe e jogue, super recomendo!

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 octobre 2019
Well, it' s a BIG rip-off or Valve' s portal game, which -I personally- think, is much better than Gravitas.
To be more specific:

Curator is Wheatley, Shi is GLaDOS, the cube is the companion cube, the lasers are killing you the same way those in portal are, these magnetic things are the funnels, the puzzle rooms are the puzzle rooms and so on.

I think that I am in the 4th or 5th room and I don' t think I like it so much. But it is definitely worth a try. Let' s just hope that it won' t be so short, as all the other people said. The humor is almost an exact copy of the one in portal and a bit child-ier. Oh and do you remember the "Aperture laboratories", which became "Wheatley laboratories"? Well, now I think that they should be named "Curator laboratories"...

Évaluation publiée le 9 septembre 2019
A lot like Portal only not so much lateral thinking involved, although the AI sounds to much like Rimmer from RED DWARF and as I am sure I am NOT the only one in saying, Rimmer was an annoying f. u. c. k. just like the AI is in this!

Though this Gravitas is an ABSOLUTE MUST of a download, it is however intended solely for the VERY HIGHLY INTELLIGENT (football fans NOT included in this description) people on this very aggressive penile colony known better by its Terran name; EARTH!

Prepare to turn your locale very blue with the language you will use as you realise the heat sync' in your brain is just not powerful enough to keep you calm for long!!
 
DAVE
124 produits enregistrés
1
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 aout 2020
El juego es simple como una aceituna. Los puzzles son demasiado básicos y el juego dura muy poco. Para que os hagáis una idea de lo sencillo que es este juego, me lo descargué a las 19:55 y a las 20:45 de ese mismo día ya lo había completado al 100%. Es una lástima que haya sido así de corto, porque si hubiese llegado a tener más duración o si los puzzles hubiesen sido realmente desafiantes, sería un buen juego.

No es malo para nada, está muy bien hecho y se nota que le han puesto mucho cariño a la hora de diseñarlo, pero por querer crear un juego gratuito, no han hecho juego prácticamente. La única ventaja que tiene este juego y por lo que recomendaría jugarlo es por el hecho de ser gratuito, ya que así, si este te decepciona, solo habrás perdido una hora de tu vida . En conclusión, es un juego ♥♥♥ mucho potencial pero que los creadores no han sabido explotar.

Recommandé
1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 aout 2019
This is a pretty fun, free to play video game. It has obviously been inspired by Portal 2 with a knockoff funny wheatley, cute sounding glados like robot and that one portal 2 puzzle which you use to fly around. Overall it took me around an hour to complete, but it's free so there are no complaints about the length of the game. Controls can feel slippy at times. Overall a pretty nice, free puzzle game that's worth a download.
Please check out my funny gameplay video of this game on youtube!
Vidéo YouTube™: Gravitas Game Funny Moments! - Gameplay (PC/Steam) 
Vues : 208
Gravitas game funny moments. These are the best Gravitas gameplay (PC/Steam) moments! You can also call it a Gravitas video game let's play! This game was inspired by Portal 2 and it shows.

Thanks!

merder222
975 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 novembre 2019
A short and funny puzzle-platformer that feels quite similar to Portal 2 but without the portals. Original comparison I know. Took me 2 hours to beat it around 3 times along with getting all the achievements and I loved every second of it.
Gravitas is not exactly easy nor hard as it doesn't limit you much on how you complete a puzzle. You get to mess around with a little gravity and usually blocks which sometimes allows for different small variations to completing it.
The dialogue in the game is hilarious and better yet there is loads of it. Skipping past dialogue can alter the next set of dialogue or even just waiting after the first can trigger more and it's always worth the wait for that extra little pinch of humor.
I must say that you will enjoy this for sure if you like puzzle-platformers and/or have enjoyed Portal 2.
 
Slanto

PolyPigeon
183 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 septembre 2019
A clever and witty physics-based puzzle game, the kind that would fit perfectly into the Portal universe!

It's short but sweet, and replayable if you want to get all of the achievements or try new interactions with the Curator, the eccentric hovering robot who narrates and guides you through his gallery of puzzles.

At the time of writing this review, I've spent about an hour in this game, and I'm almost at the end of my first playthrough. But for a free game that takes only an hour or two to complete, it's really good!


What makes it stand out for me is that 1) it's surprisingly free (and of great quality at that), and 2) the Curator reacts to the silent player's actions. I see so little of this in games, and here it's hilarious. I love seeing the Curator react to me leaving the room while he's in mid-sentence, or trying an alternate solution to a puzzle and hearing his disappointment. It makes that little robot feel more human than most human characters.

An easy recommend (c'mon, it's like getting a free slice of birthday cake! What's to complain about that?). I hope to see more from these devs!
Even if it's a longer game with a price tag attached, I'm already sold on it!
 
Doctor Overdrive

Évaluation publiée le 21 mars 2020
Great example of some polished student work. Some of the puzzles are pretty straight forward and there isn't a ton of depth, but the overall presentation is excellent. Recommended to any Portal fans looking for something similar, but much shorter.

Would love to see it polished into a full length game. Possibly with multiple gravity streams and reversing gravity streams and other cool mechanisms.

hydra
67 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 mai 2021
Produit reçu gratuitement

Короткая, но весьма интересная и весёлая игра в стиле легендарной Portal. Здесь есть и оригинальный юмор, и заставляющие задуматься головоломки, и даже несколько сотен пингвинов). Единственным минусом этой игры стала её непродолжительность: тратя кучу времени на исследование локаций и решение элементарных головоломок, я прошёл её всего за час с небольшим. А так, в целом, игра прикольная, рекомендую к прохождению, если есть лишний часок времени, да к тому же игра ещё и бесплатная)

Pico
148 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juillet 2020
· 虚幻引擎（应该是4吧？），画质很不错；
· 感觉很像传送门系列，都是一个机器人引导玩家通关；
· 关卡有黄点标识通关的路线，这一点很好，不会卡关；
· 游戏只有繁体中文，不过我经常和台湾打交道，看得懂繁体字；
· 游戏中那个机器人与SHI的对话很有趣；
· 别的评价说有彩蛋，不过我玩的急，应该没发现几个；
· 进游戏默认分辨率4k，动态模糊开，需要进设置调整；

· 关卡少，游戏流程短，这一点可以加以改进。

Sickle
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 janvier 2020
So, this game... It's much, much better than what I expected.
From the "negative reviews" I thought this would be a crappy, unrefined copy of portal. I was wrong, but there's two problems...

It doesn't have a good motivation, nor reward for certain crucial actions.
Let me explain further (mild spoilers, duh):

Why would I want to complete a certain puzzle I don't have the brainpower to do? What compels me to finish the game besides achievements and for the sake of it? Give players more structure to the narrative. Give us visible danger while the core overheats and melts, like the dead penguins, but something we see, something that gives us visible tension, specially at the end, punish players by killing them if they sit around the lobby for too long while GORG warns us to leave. If you take too long, make the AI following you say something like: "I didn't think you'd take THIS long in this room, let me give you a GROUNDBREAKING VALUABE hint..."

As for rewards, well... Let's say you're told to stay in the fifth room. The narrator bot wants you to stay, but the game Really wants you to move on. What if you actually obey the narrator and stay? What do you get? Well, a huge time loss, since room five is never finished, at least not in 5 minutes of waiting. Make a reward for the patient players by giving them extra content!

Besides that, the puzzles are decently challenging and the VAs do a pretty great job! Congrats! The voices fit, and I like the reactions when you just rush past them, not paying attention. They also make it clear when you're actually making progress or not. A bigger marketing presence would definitly help the game's popularity.

Also the game's EXTREMELY SHORT. But it has many qualities.

Tl;DR: game is good, specially for free, but some changes in motivation and rewards could give it that extra hand to reach higher scores. VAs are good with somewhat challenging levels, but it ultimately suffers because many don't know this game.
 
Hard Guess
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
6.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 décembre 2019
1- Схожа с игрой Q.U.B.E.2 намного больше чем на Portal.
2- Игра не короткая если не бежать сломя голову и не выполнять достижения и не подсматривать в руководства...
3- Достижения в коллекцию и в идеальные игры не добавляются.
4- Оценка 10\10.

Évaluation publiée le 1 décembre 2019
Ein "muss" für jeden der Portal mag/liebt! Bin zwar noch nicht am Ziel, da für mich die Aufgabenstellung etwas "mager" war/ist. Gerade wegen dem Handschuh und nicht eine Waffe, wie in Portal. Somit stelle ich mich bisher, hmm... doof an, was aber dem Spiel und dem erlebten im Spiel überhaupt nicht schadet. Wie schon in Portal, impressive Impressionen!
Das muss belohnt, aber auch anerkannt werden gerade weil "es sich um ein kostenfreies Spiel handelt!" N1
 
evox|Obi
339 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 novembre 2019
This is an absolutely fantastic joy of a game that reminds me of the Wheatley sections of Portal 2. As an avid fan of the Portal franchise (I replay it yearly) I can say that this is a MUST DOWNLOAD. First off it's free so if you don't like it or its not your thing then you can uninstall it and it didn't cost you anything to try. Secondly, the voice acting and self-aware humor is something rarely implemented well in anything, with exceptions such as Deadpool and the sequel, and it is a very funny game in general. Thirdly, this game engages the mind in a way few do alike the aforementioned Portal series, it is truly hard on the mind but that's the joy of it. I would recommend this for anyone to try and although i know not everyone appreciates this game like I do, I believe that this game is so good it's worth the download. If the creator of this game reads this comment I would gladly pay money for this as it is completely worth every penny in my opinion. Keep up the amazing work creator and I hope to see more of this in the future!

9/10

0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 aout 2019
繼傳送門後好久沒玩類似的解謎遊戲了，而這款意外的非常讚!
館長先生的幽默、AI SHI 的可愛 (SHI聲音真的好可愛#

劇情後面的轉折也做得相當不錯! 解謎部份個人覺得稍微動點腦就能馬上解決了。
第一次破關花不到一小時但卻讓人無法忘懷，想要繼續玩啊! 再出第二款或著是完整版之類的肯定買爆!
缺點老實講我覺得沒有，除了劇情流程非常短之外的缺點...大概就遊戲裡的材質顯得有點單調?
總而言之非常推薦這款《重力美術館 Gravitas》給喜歡解謎、傳送門遊戲的人!

podkast.mp3
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 novembre 2019
A neat little game.
Reminds me of Portal, where you work with the tractor beam.
To make it short: It´s a nice puzzel game with good humor, your attendant feels "alive" through comment on your behaviour (e.g. you just go to the next room without letting him finish what he has to say, or beating a stage too fast).
Gameplay and Puzzels are also good, just well there arent many, so you could play finish it in under an hour.
The story is, well there.

All in all a good game, sad there is just a few stages, but hey its free. So yeah, go ahead and play it.
 
llon11
411 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 aout 2020
Gravitas, tomber des nues

Gravitas est un petit jeu gratuit d’une durée de vie approximative de 45mins-1h développé par Galaxy Shark Studios. Il est présenté comme un Puzzle Game et m’a l’air beaucoup inspiré de Portal. Si vous ne savez pas quoi faire pendant 1h, vous pouvez toujours essayer Gravitas mais personnellement je ne vous le recommande pas.

Trop de choses ne vont pas et sa seule qualité c’est sa gratuité. De prime abord, les contrôles et le déplacement de la caméra m’ont donné la nausée tout le long de ma session, pour le coup c’est tout à fait subjectif mais sait-on jamais d’autres pourrait le ressentir.

Niveau trame narrative et interactivité avec les personnages, personnellement j’ai trouvé ça très malaisant et assez maladroit. J’ai bien senti cette envie de créer un personnage excentrique et avec quelques traits de GlaDOS mais malheureusement c’est un raté de mon côté. Beaucoup de lignes de dialogue (enfin de monologue en vrai) m’ont fait pensé à Portal, mais il n’y avait pas le charme qui va avec. Pour moi c’est donc tombé à plat.

En ce qui concerne les puzzles en eux même, c’est honnêtement pas très compliqué et j’avoue avoir eu un peu l’impression d’aller en ligne droite. Cela dit, pour les plus novices je pense que ça peut être OK. Le plus gros problème c’est pas les puzzles c’est l’utilisation du gant de gravité qui répond pas toujours comme on veut. Disons que dans la théorie c’est intuitif mais dans la pratique moins.

Gravitas étant gratuit, si vous êtes intéressés testez le. Mais si vous avez le moindre doute, je ne vous conseille pas. Enfin, tout au plus vous perdrez une heure.

Vous pouvez suivre la page curateur ici : Sacrez'Art.
 
Sacrezar
1,086 produits enregistrés
0

Évaluation publiée le 12 janvier 2020
If you've got motion sickness issues, don't bother. The head bob in this game is the worst I've seen so far, and of course there's no setting to disable it. Couldn't even get past the main lobby before I had to give this one a pass, so I have no idea if it's good or bad otherwise, but I have to say No based on this short experience.

AbiNeKhorn
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 septembre 2019
This is like getting a new Portal game - only somehow it's free.
It's not quite the quality of Portal 2 in terms of the absolutely perfect refinement and voice acting, but it's pretty close to Portal 1. And considering that this is free - how can I pay for it? I want to pay for this game - it's that good. There have been one or two times when I wondered if I had gotten it into an unsolvable situation, but I quickly discovered I was wrong and the puzzles were still perfectly solvable and I was progressing exactly as the player should.
I'd give this a 9/10 if I paid $20 or $30 for it; with the suggestion of slightly improving the textures and bringing the lighting up to the state-of-the-art. As a free game, it's 11/10.

유튜브 육제육
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Non recommandé
2.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 novembre 2020
It's just a cheap Portal wanna-be knockoff. Puzzles in a SciFi environment, commented by a robot with borderline personality as a comedy relief attempt. Déjà vu.

It's way too short, two hours at most with all achievements, and offers no real challenge, except when poor physics and mechanisms get in the way. No safeguards there to ensure puzzles will behave as intended and are easy to achieve once you thought about the correct solution.

Interestingly, I had to set the graphics settings to the minimum in order to prevent my eyes from being raped by the excess of visual effects, which are pretty ugly anyway. It also helped to reduce the motion sickness.

Let's also add that you cannot load a level beyond the third one, as the level select screen is broken.

Even free, I'm not recommending it though. Overall, it was a pretty boring experience. All aspects of the game feel like a miss. A near one, but a miss nonetheless.
 
Farfadh
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 aout 2019
This game is super fun and I haven't laughed in a video game like this in a long time. I 100 percent love this game. The puzzles, the humor and achievements. I'm almost done the game I love everything about it. I would actually pay for this "free" game. I am not disappointed in this game at all. Go PLAY IT!

Évaluation publiée le 20 janvier 2020
Pros:
+Good gameplay
+Runs smoothly
+Great sense of humor
+Every little thing you do will change the game, making it always interesting to find new secrets and voice lines
+Almost entirely family friendly apart from a minor curse near the end. (Plus some mild dark humor I suppose)
+Space Sharks
♥♥♥♥:
-A tad short but makes up for it due to the amount of secrets you can find

Overall, just try the game, it's free!

Pro tip: before grabbing the gravity glove, jump into the pit. After acquiring the glove, don't do anything.

Un développeur ou une développeuse a répondu à cette évaluation
lennoxdks
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 octobre 2019
Nice, Quick, Straightforward.

The instructors are funny. the game is well designed and easy to learn. #Catchphrase start thinking in gravities. I now own that line. It'd not a very long game so there's not really a lot of room for praise before I can start criticizing it. Even though it was simplistic, I would've liked to see a reaction from the instructor when I fail. he already reacts to almost everything else. The game is trying to be portal but it lacks in some places. It is far too short. I finished in under an hour. There are some achievements I missed but I have no motivation to go back and play it again as is. Also I automatically subtract a point for any game that doesn't allow you to configure video before starting or at least detects optimal video. Not everyone has a Monster sitting under their desk ready to destroy any graphical problems. It cancels out however because it is an indie game.  I recommend playing it. it wont take up too much of your time and what I've seen, I liked. Kudos to the devs. But please take my constructive criticism into account. This game has the potential to get a 10/10

Total score
4/10
 
Ferratauris
92 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
0.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 mai 2023
Remember Portal? So do the developers of Gravitas.

Might be an alright first-person physics puzzler as it progresses, but I was so annoyed at the narration and its tone (think Borderlands) that I dipped after 30 minutes. If you still think a misanthropic AI giving you funny instructions on how to use your future technology device is entertaining 16 years after Portal, then by all means: Gravitas may be for you. I however found it instantly tiresome.

Free, short single-player game.
It looks very pretty and clean.
And the humor is a very nice touch.
Fairly fun when you're doing things, got stumped on two puzzles because physics wasn't my friend.
Give it a try.
Pros -
+ Mechanics
+ Voice Acting
+ Dialogue
+ Gameplay
+ Cubes
+ The Curator
+ SHI
+ Fun

♥♥♥♥ -
- Short
- Easy Puzzles

Definitely worth a play even though the game is fairly short. It's free can't hurt to give it a go. Great game would play the sequel if its being made. [9/10]

Несмешной юмор, отталкивающие персонажи, озвучка и графика на низком уровне. Попытка откусить часть славы Portal. Хорошо, что игра бесплатная. Головоломки нормальные, но их мало и механика быстро надоедает. Некоторые уровни пришлось перезапускать из-за багов. Жаль потраченного времени.

Évaluation publiée le 31 mars 2020
This game does not work properly. It seems fine up until I get the glove. But the glove does not do anything. LEFT-click, which the robot implores me to use, does not do anything no matter where I point it. I tried exiting the game and changing that function to an actual key on the keyboard and that key doesn't do anything either. For some reason, in Gravitas, it is not possible to create a gravity field. Which is the entire point of the game. Sorry to say I will be uninstalling it without having really played it. I'm just glad I didn't have to pay for this.

Évaluation publiée le 14 mars 2021
Its kinda fun, but it is CLEARLY just a ripoff of Portal. The Curator is clearly just Wheatley, just like in Portal there is a place where you find out "Oh that person directing me is evil.", and SHI is just The Announcer in Portal except with a feminine voice. Overall fun game, yet too heavily inspired by Portal.

Évaluation publiée le 8 mars 2020
Produit reçu gratuitement

Игра очень ужасная. Не рекомендую. Для людей которые хотят купить данную игру, вот вам плюсы и минусы этой игры:
+
1. Бесплатная
2. Мало требовательна
3. Замена игры Portal

-
1. Ужасный сюжет
2. Ужасная графика
3. Не логичные уровни
4. Невероятно скучная
5. Плохой геймплей

Больше всего радует что она хотя бы бесплатная.

It's a cheap Portal wanna-be knockoff. The puzzles are extremely simple and there are only half a dozen of them, so I was able to complete them all in under an hour. The storyline, if you can even call it that, is nothing but a pathetic attempt at comedy and is otherwise a waste of time. Seriously disappointed.

ENSKii
400 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
0.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 octobre 2019
Unresponsive controls for very basic control scheme. Half the time I left/right click it doesn't do it's single, simple function. The pull thingies are coded kind of poorly, and sometimes don't pull the boxes correctly. Mouse sensitivity has to be manually lowered in 3rd party software if you don't want absurd sensitivity with its lowest option being significantly faster than it should be. The robot AI chatacters and gameplay seem to be basically stolen from the Portal games. Only real upside is that it's F2P so luckily no money was wasted on it, but rest assured if I did pay, a refund would be under way.

Évaluation publiée le 26 aout 2019
A very short but polished and entertaining puzzle-platformer.

The best aside from the puzzles were the dialogs with the Curator. If you like these kind of games and don't mind it's shortness, i can totally recommend trying it out.

Personally, i would love to see more from the game, like more levels, maybe in the future.
 
VaLiuM
3,530 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
4.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 mai 2023
Все равно никто не читает мои отзывы.
Кину рецепт Винегрет с консервированной кукурузой


Продукты
Картофель - 4 шт.
Свекла - 2-3 шт.
Горошек зеленый - 300 г
Кукуруза консервированная - 300 г
Огурцы маринованные - 300 г
Лук репчатый - 1 шт.
Зелень - 10 г
Соль - 0,25 ч.л.
Перец - 1 щепотка
Горчица столовая - 1 ч.л. с горкой
Масло растительное - 70 мл



Приготовление винегрета с кукурузой.

Картофель отварить "в мундире" в течении 25 минут, слить воду. Остудить, очистить.

Нарезать картофель кубиками.
Свеклу отварить "в мундире" 40-50 минут. Слить воду, остудить, очистить, нарезать кубиками, добавить к картошке.

Открыть баночку зеленого горошка, слить жидкость, добавить горошек в салат.

Мелко нарезать очищенный репчатый лук и добавить в салат.
Нарезать кубиками маринованные огурцы и добавить в салат.
Открыть баночку кукурузы, слить жидкость и добавить в салат.
Салат посолить, поперчить по вкусу, по желанию добавить зелень и заправить винегрет с кукурузой растительным маслом, смешанным с 1 ч.л. горчицы. Все перемешать.
Салат винегрет с кукурузой готов.
Приятного аппетита!
 
annette anderson

Rich
176 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Non recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 janvier 2020
NAJA, das ganze wirkt auf mich schon recht abgekupfert von PORTAL.
Sehr eintönig da man nur mit dem einen Strahl und Würfeln arbeitet, nichts neues, gab es bereits in PORTAL schon!

Die 6 Level (wenn ich richtig gezählt habe) waren schnell erledigt, reine Spielzeit ohne den anderen Schnick-Schnack herum. ca. 30 Minuten wenn man den nötigen Grips besitzt.

Zudem stell ich mir die Frage wenn ich mir den Abspann ansehe, wieso so viele Leute an diesem Spiel gearbeitet haben und dann nur ein mehr oder weniger kurzes Spiel/Demo entstanden ist welches dann kostenlos angeboten wird???

Vermutlich wollte man hier nur zeigen was das Entwickler Studio kann oder die Ideen zum Level Design sind ausgegangen (bei dem minimalen Umfang des Games auch kein Wunder), oder was auch immer....ist halt merkwürdig!

Spielen kann man es, muss man aber auch nicht unbedingt.

Von mir daher keine Empfehlung!

Vues : 910
안녕하세요. 함께 만들어가는 게임채널 껨뚜입니다. 오늘 게임 영상은 스팀에서 다운로드 가능한 #GRAVITAS 라는 게임입니다. 중력을 소재로한 탈출게임인데요. 게임이 창의적이고 신박한게 꽤 재밌습니다 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 현재 스팀에서 무료로 다운로드 가능하니 해보시고 싶은신 분들은 다운로드해서 한번해보세요~! 재밌어여~!

Évaluation publiée le 22 février 2021
Everyone that said this has good humor, your review is void. It's a poor man's Portal 2 lite. I don't know who they paid to get an Overwhelmingly Positive, but I'm guessing it like those joke Amazon reviews. All the puzzle are fairly middle school level. AND STOP BEING THE PORTAL 2 want a be. It was terrible, contrived BS. The lady AI (?) voice is about the best think in here but even then .... eh.

The graphics aren't good, the music wasn't good. most puzzles are solved in seconds, the voice acting was TERRIBLE. It seems like one of those game made in one day or two while in a game making workshop.

SKRZYDALTA REKOMENDACJA *

꧁ G E N I A L N E ! CZYLI PORTAL ZA FRIKO ꧂
nie spodziewłam się tutaj niczego nawte trohe abitnego a tutaj się okazuje ze jest to darmowa perełka

Fabuła
Trafilismy do pewnego osrodka gdzie zosltismy pupilem pewnego robota bo porzednim mu zmarl smuteczki i podbnie jak portalu przechodizmy przez pokoje humor zawarty w grze jest świętny dawno się tak nie ubawiłam przy grze która jest za damo naprwde

GRAFIKA
Autorze się tutaj postarali mamy efekty widać ze dopiszczli pordukcje jak mogli

Muzyka
Udziekownei jak dla mnie poprawne zrozumiałęs nie mam nic do rzaucenia

Rozgrywka
Ogólnie operujemy tutaj grawitacją zamist portali

Podsumuwjąć
Graw wimiata jeśli chodzi o stadarty gier za darmo na stem jeśli poszkujesz gry podbnej do poratla To koniecznie ją zagraj nie pożałujesz ! BARDZO POLECAM

✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---✂---

*Tą rekomendacje dostają tylko gry które naprwdę są do porządku zrobione oraz które mnie oczarowały

1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 janvier
优点：
一款明显模仿《传送门》系列却又做出了自己特色的实验室式小品级解谜游戏，那个蓝色方块小人的塑造也颇为有趣。
缺点：
可能是引擎的缘故，也可能是开发者技术力的缘故，游戏的泛光非常夸张，在游玩过程中极有可能出现晕3D现象。

rotnesnordre

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 décembre 2023
《無劇透評論：Gravitas》

主旨：我推薦呢款遊戲，因為以免費嘅角度嚟講，有咁嘅質品係唔差。

遊戲壽命：如果你好似我咁，稍為探索下環境﹑會留心聽晒人物對白同解謎能力唔差（至少唔睇攻略都爆到《傳送門》同《送傳門2》）嘅話，咁大約只有80分鐘遊戲壽命左右。

優點：
一﹑人物配音生動。遊戲中只有兩個人物會講嘢：第一係引導者，第二係智能系統。兩者嘅配音水準符合各自人物設定。

缺點：
一﹑難度缺乏挑戰性。由於謎題元素唔夠多同設計過於簡單，所以難度上不如《傳送門》高。

二﹑劇情未算好。雖然劇情背景有趣（至少吸引我玩落去），但玩到最後，發現劇情上有好多嘢都冇解釋。其次，主角同主要人物，分別係冇解釋動機同動機薄弱。

總結：雖然呢款遊戲嘅質素，只有《傳送門》嘅一半，但由於係免費同質素唔係算太低嘅關係，因此我認為係值得一試嘅。

 
遊戲玩家
169 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
57.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 décembre 2023
Produit reçu gratuitement

Reseña de Gravitas: Un Término de Significado Profundo

"Gravitas" es un término en latín que se traduce comúnmente como "seriedad" o "peso". En un contexto más amplio, se refiere a la dignidad, seriedad y responsabilidad que una persona muestra en situaciones importantes. La palabra implica una cierta autoridad y respeto debido a la presencia y comportamiento de alguien.

Titulado "Gravitas":

Si "Gravitas" se refiere a un juego específico, podría interpretarse como un título que busca transmitir una experiencia seria, profunda o impactante. El juego podría centrarse en temas significativos, ofrecer una narrativa profunda o presentar desafíos que requieran una reflexión seria por parte del jugador.

Conclusión:

mi revisión se basa en la interpretación del término y su significado general. Para poder dar ampliar la perspectiva del Jugado.
 
Tamao
33 produits enregistrés
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 décembre 2023
Забавная небольшая поделка, вдохновлённая серий игр Portal и спроектирована в схожем стиле. Такой же стиль юмора и схожие по дизайну головоломки. Игра также выглядит очень приятно. И хотя она ощущается слегка вторично, а головоломки в ней не очень замысловатые, но она точно стоит времени, которое вы на неё потратите. И она бесплатна.

Дійсно чудова гра, яка нагадує Portal 2, шкода тільки що коротка(на годинку максимум ще + пів години на всі досягнення).Сам робот помічник мені нагадав Вітлі з того ж самого портала(досі його ненавиджу ^ ω ^). Ще можу зазначити про музику "Local Forecast - Elevator" просто чудово сюди підходить.

Хотелось бы конечно игру на подольше (часов на 8-16 прохождения), а так в целом за такую игру и заплатить не жалко, те же 600 рублей как за entropy centre отдать можно спокойно, но только если в игру добавят много контента по уровням)

Very fun and well made game. I really enjoyed collecting the achievements on this one and going back to each level for the tiny secrets. There's also so many things you can do that can trigger unique and funny dialogue depending on how you play. It's one of the higher quality games that you can get for free on steam so I 100% would recommend to give this game a shot. You'll most likely enjoy it too!

Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 décembre 2023
Gravitas is a solid puzzler game. I like the humor and voice acting. It's a bit short, but free, so I'm not complaining, just wishing for more. The headbob is annoying and makes me feel a little sick, but the game is so short that I was actually able to complete it. I'd pay for a sequel especially if I could disable the headbob.


Puzzler games I recommend:

Portal / Portal 2 / Portal Stories: Mel
The Talos Principle / The Talos Principle II
The Entropy Centre
The Turing Test
The Swapper
Baba is You
Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary / Q.U.B.E. 2 (QUBE 2)
Relicta
The Witness
ReThink
Gravitas


Puzzler games that I do not recommend:

Superliminal
Magnetic: Cage Closed
Magrunner: Dark Pulse
Human Fall Flat
Manifold Garden
Antichamber

Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
3.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 décembre 2023
Produit reçu gratuitement

Basically this game is like Portal but with gravity instead. There are about 5 or 6 Levels in this game, but each level comes with a new concept to learn which keeps the gameplay interesting and exciting. There are also several secret achievements to earn, which I always love to find when playing something on Steam. I would recommend this game to anyone who's looking for a new puzzle challenge.

As a Portal fan this was fun to play. It took me just over a couple of hours to play through and I thoroughly enjoyed it.
The rooms got a little harder each time and I did really struggle in one room until I had a face palm moment and figured it out.
Nice graphics, great voice acting and it was free! What's not to love!. Highly recommend grabbing this if you want to pass a couple of hours . I didn't get all the achievements so will definitely go back in sometime to get those. 9/10 *

FIRESTARTER_Qc
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 novembre 2023
Wow, I can't believe this is a free game. I mean, it's pretty dang short, so I do actually get it, but for hyperbole's sake, let's let the first statement stand.
The puzzles are fun, the gameplay is satisfying, the voice acting is great, and the writing is top notch. While there might be a touch too much random xD humor for some, I thought this game was very funny. SHI, the cheery, passive aggressive AI, is a wonderful counterpart to the brooding artsy takes-themselves-too-seriously Curator.
Definitely worth your time, and I am looking forward to any future projects the developers put their talents to.

Évaluation publiée le 20 novembre 2023
Un petit jeu gratuit avec d'excellentes idées, bien exploitées, et le jeu est court donc elles n'ont pas le temps d'être abusées et de devenir saoulantes. Le tout saupoudré par quelques blagounettes sympa, on sent vraiment l'inspiration de Portal.

Laudart
0
Personne n'a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 novembre 2023
Great Game, Fun puzzles and puzzle design, Pretty funny story/dialogue as well. I enjoyed all the variation in said dialogue especially when repeating a level, and the attention to detail with the animations and expressions as well. But, for all the penguins that are talked about, I didn't see any :/. It seemed like it definitely took some inspiration from portal, but it is also definitely unique and not a copy of it. All in all it was a fun, if a little short, puzzle platformer that took a relatively simple mechanic and explored a number of possibilities for it's use.


Achievement Spoiler + Mild Complaint:
It is extremely easy to be knocked out/through the wall of the pupil pod at the very end of the game if you are attempting to complete 'recycling' on the last level. The can may roll backward or just generally glitch around and end up shoving you through the back wall. This results in you falling through space, able to see through the level and not(afaik) triggering the end credits. I may be wrong about the last point, but I sat there for a little while waiting to see, just looking around, and nothing happened.
